description.zh: 本課程教學目標在教導初學者電腦基本概念及軟硬體系統構架之認識，使學生熟悉電腦基本應用及操作技巧，培養使用電腦興趣與習慣，運用電腦解決學業上問題。主要授課內容包括：1.個人電腦實地操作與認識、2.DOS 指令運用、3.基本語言使用、4.套裝軟體應用：a.文書處理軟體:PE2、WORD、b.試算表軟體:如LOTUS1-2-3、EXCEL、c.資料處理軟體：如DBASE、FOX、d.其他軟體、5.網路操作。
description.en: The course objective is to provide students the conceptual framework for employing computing technology to aid the studies of academic works and delivers the practical skills for making immediate and effective use of the emerging digital facilities.Topics focus on the operations of personal computer and its peripheries , usages  of various software packages, and the practical applications of Internet.

description.zh: 授課內容為：1.基本線條及圖形練習、2.建築元素及符號之認識、3.建築圖面繪製(平、立、剖面、透視、大樣)、4.基本建築圖面表現法練習、授課方式包括相關知識講解與隨堂操作練習、製圖成張來達、標準者須反覆練習至合格為止。
description.en: 1.	Basic graphic tramning.2.	Symbols of building elements.3.	Design drawing with plan, elevation, section, detail and isometric presentation.

description.zh: 本課程目標針對大一新生入門介紹建築專業分支領域。由建築學基本涵構作概略介紹，輔以案例介紹及適當實地參觀研討，進而了解建築學相關知識體系，並對未來四年建築專業課程內容有全盤性認識，進ㄧ步結合未來出路願景。著重訓練思考及觀察能力，以利學生認識建築學之整體關聯性，進而建立其全方位學習藍圖。內容包括建築相關產業與建造程序、體驗建築、建築單位尺寸、建築結構系統之美、建築設計風格、建築教育、新一代建築師、建築構造與材料、建築的社會文化性、建築與環境共生、建築與都市發展、建築相關法令等。
description.en: This course gives a brief introduction with those knowledge related architecture and construction for the freshmen of department of Architecture, that students may have a whole concept about each professional courses for the future 4 years. This course is focus on training the ability of thinking & observation of students to establish the integrated structure of Architecture.

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車傳動系統及車身鈑噴實習，包含汽車車身及機車車架拆裝調整檢修，傳動系統元件拆裝調整檢修，車身測量，車身研磨、焊接及液壓施力設備之操作，金屬鈑金件之維修，車架及車身之校正及調整，門緣、車頭、玻璃及防潮條之更換，碰撞損壞之維修；塗裝及噴漆設備，塗裝及噴漆材料，配色技巧，車輛之塗裝及噴漆實際操作，完成品之品質檢驗。95學年度前入學者適用下列實習內容: 車輛電系和可程式控制器，包括：引擎電系，充電系檢測，點火系檢測，電池之檢測與換裝，電腦控制系檢測，電腦診斷系統檢測，其他電控系統檢測；可程式控制器系統規劃，可程式控制器之整合與評估，可程式控制器應用。
description.en: Automobile Drive Trains , Body Refinishing and Painting Service Shop Practice , Include the Repair, Overhaul and Trouble-Shooting of Automobile Transmission and Chassis, Automobile Body and Motorcycle Frame Assembly, Basic Dimensional Measurements, Inspection and Adjustments. The practice of automobile body sanding, welding and hydraulic straightening equipment; repairing of the sheet-metal panels; frame and body alignment; door trim, headlinings, glass and weatherstripping replacement; repairing of the collision damages ; Automobile refinishing and painting equipment, refinishing and painting materials , color matching, the practice of refinishing and painting of the vehicle , painting quality testing .For those students who enter the school before 2006 Fall Semester , the practice contents are :Electrical and Electronic System, Battery, Starting System, Charging System, Ignition System, Computer Control System, Computer Diagnostic System. Programmable logic controller (PLC) combi

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control, Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en: Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to AutomobileTransmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意空調的基本原理，冷凍的基本循環原理：冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Piping and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

description.zh: 品質管制之基本觀念，應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質，管制圖，抽樣原理，品質成本，品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 軌道車輛轉向架系統，軌道的設計，輪軌關係，軌道工程專用術語。
description.en: Boige System，Track Design，Relationships between Wheel and Track，Track Terms .

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 引擎型式及運轉，引擎循環之理想模式，引擎設計及運轉之重要參數，燃料空氣混合之熱力學分析，工作流體的特性，實際引擎循環，引擎燃燒現象及分析，污染控制，引擎控制介紹引擎性能及特性分析。
description.en: Engine Types and Their Operation, Ideal Models of Engine Cycles, Engine Design and Operating Parameters, Thermodynamic of Fuel-Air Mixtures, Properties of Working Fluids, Practical Models of Engine Cycles, Combustion Features and Analysis, Pollutant Control, Engine Control, Engine Performance and Characteristics Analysis

description.zh: 先修課程:4403054或負責教授同意流體機械總論、輪機機械之歐拉理論總升程、及設計原理，相似定律及比速率、水輪機、各種泵之升程、功率，效率及損失，泵原動機功率設計，特性曲線、孔蝕現像、水鎚作用，軸之平衡。空氣機械、流體聯結器與扭拒變速器、油壓及氣力機具。
description.en: Introduction and Classification of Fluid Machines, Turbo-machinery Analysis (Including the Angular Momentum Principle, Euler's Turbo-machine Equation, Velocity Polygon Analysis), Performance Characteristics ( Including Performance Parameter, Dimensional Analysis and Specific Speed, Similarity Rules, Cavitation and Net Positive Suction Head (NPSH) ), Introduction to Water Turbine , Introduction to Pumps, Introduction to Air Machinery, Introductionto Fluid Coupling and Fluid Torque Converter, Introduction to Oil Hydraulic and Pneumatic Machinery or Equipment.

description.zh: 基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始、邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts and Its Scope, Numerical Solution of Nonlinear Algebraic Equations and Sets of Equations, Interpolating Polynomials, Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration, Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, Numerical Solution of Boundary-Value Problems and Initial-Value Problems.

description.zh: 運動方程式，一維振動（自由及強制），振動量測，二維振動，多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced), Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple- Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組，凸輪，齒輪，純滾動系統，鏈輪，皮帶，滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en: Introduction of the principles which all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members． Examples include linkages, Cams, Gears, Pure rolling system, Chain drives, Belt drives, Friction drives, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意物質熱力學特性，改變能量形式之基本原理，熱力學第一及第二定律，可逆性與可用性，動力循環，冷凍循環，混合氣，化學反應。
description.en: Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law of Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程： 無。本實習內容為汽車底盤實習，包含底盤綜合保養檢修、轉向懸吊及煞車系統元件拆裝調整檢修、檢修調整汽車前輪定位、拆裝輪胎總成及校正平衡、操作使用底盤動力計、煞車及偏滑實驗儀器。
description.en: Automobile Chassis Service Shop Practice , the basic inspection, adjustment and repair of Automobile Chassis System, Include the Automobile Suspension systems, Steering systems and Braking systems, Tire Repair and Balance practice, Wheel-Alignment practice , Chassis dynamometer Experiment , Brake performance and Slide Test .

description.zh: 基本邏輯閘，組合邏輯電路，組合邏輯設計，正反器，序向邏輯電路，序向邏輯設計，可程式邏輯元件設計。
description.en: Basic Logic Gates, Combinatorial Logic Circuits, Combinatorial Logic Design, Flip Flops, Sequential Logic Circuit, Sequential Logic Design, Logic Design with Programmable Logic Device.

description.zh: 先修課程:微積分或負責教授同意常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，級數及傅立葉級數，線性代數及矩陣，積分定理。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, Matrices.

description.zh: 電池分類，電池化學，電池功能及表現，電池之製造，電池使用注意事項，電池檢驗及測試，電池選擇及安裝，燃料電池，電動車使用之電池未來高級電池之介紹。
description.en: Battery Classification，Battery Chemistry，Battery Function and Performance，Battery Manufacturing，Battery service Precautions，Battery Inspection and Testing，Battery Selection and Installation，Fuel Battery， Battery for the Electric Vehicle，Introduction to the Advanced Future Battery.

description.zh: 本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本，內容包括二維製圖，三維製圖，修訂功能表，命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD Software (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the Tuitional examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源、致動器、控制元件及迴路、傳送、配管、維護與安全、液氣壓比例與伺服控制、自動控制理論應用於液氣壓工程。
description.en: Introduction to Pneumatic Engineering, Characteristic of Compressible Gas, Air Conditioning & Control, Pneumatic Parts & Control Circuit, Application of Sequence Controller on Pneumatic Control, Introduction to Hydraulic Engineering, Characteristic & Conditioning of Hydraulic Fluid, Hydraulic Theory, Power Unit, Actuator, Control Parts & Safety,Hydraulic & Pneumatic Proportional & Servo Control, Application of Automatic Control to Hydraulic Engineering.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 汽車之動力性、汽車總論、引擎、底盤、傳動及電系、燃油經濟性、制動性、操縱穩定性、平順性及行駛性。
description.en: Automotive Service and Shop Work, Automobile Engines, Automobile Electrical and Electronic Equipment, Engine Performance and Drive-ability, Automotive Engine Service, Automotive Drive Trains, Automotive Chassis.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意尺寸標註與公差配合,表面符號,幾何公差,簡單機械元件圖.
description.en: Dimensioning,Fits and allowances, Auxiliary Views Basic mechanical component drawing.

name.en: Introduction to Electrical Engineering and Lab.

description.zh: 電路元件,直流電路,交流電路,電磁感應,直流電機,變壓器三相交流,三相感應電動機,單相感應電動機,同步電動機,特殊電機,電工儀表,電工法規.
description.en: Circuit Components DC Circuit, AC Circuit, Electro-magent Induction, DC Electric Machines, Transformers, Three-Phase AC, Three-Phase Induction Motors, Single-Phase Induction Motors, Synchronous Motors, special Electric Machines, Electrical Instrument and Meters.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意力系的平衡,摩擦,面積與質量慣性矩,結構分析,虛功法。
description.en: Equivalent Systems of Forces, Equilibrium, Aera and Mass, Momemts of Inertia, Analysis of Structures of Virtual Work.

description.zh: （本學分不得計入畢業學分中）。計算機之硬體基本架構及週邊設備、計算機程式設計架構、運算法則、流程圖、輔助記憶體、MS-DOS簡介、中文輸入、輸出等方式、數據通訊與網路、PC結構、BASIC語言等。
description.en: Hardware and Peripheral Equipment of a Computer, Introduction to MS-DOS And operation systems, Input-Output of Chinese Character, BASIC Language, Algorithm and Flow Chart for Programming, Data Communication and Network.

description.zh: 空調設計基礎、空調冷暖負載計算、空氣線圖應用分析、主要設備規範擬定、空調系統規劃與設備選用分析、風管工程設計、水配管工程設計、設備配置與裝設工程、材料與成本分析、節約省能規劃設計。
description.en: Fundamentals of HVAC system design, cooling/ heating load estimation, analysis of applied psychometrics charts, schematic design of HVAC system, main equipment selection, main equipment specification, air duct & water piping system design, equipments layout & installation, materials & cost analysis. HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

description.zh: 建築物勘測、負載計算實例實做、風管製圖、水管路系統製圖、冷凍空調配電設計實例實做、設備安裝－位置選定、基礎、避震及噪音控制、工程估價實例。
description.en: Building's survey, case study- load calculation, air duct system schematic drawing, water piping system schematic drawing. HVAC & R electric power system design & drawing, equipment installations-layout, foundation, vibration & noisy control planning. Engineering cost estimation practices & analysis.

description.zh: 本科目將由基本吸收式系統內，相關作動媒體及冷媒之行為等認識，進而學習更具高效率之各種形式吸收式系統裝置上之最佳設計能力。並且利用能源有效利用手法，導入冷熱系統工程上之實際應用規劃，以期發揮吸收式系統在各類狀況下的最能節省能源總體成本之特性。
description.en: The absorption heat pump, mainly based on absorption refrigerating machine in its cycle, is well-accepted with growing demand in air conditioning or process heating market.As the absorption cycle is a kind of heat process reaction, the absorption heat pump has wider application than any other heat pump systems have. This course outlines the classification, theory and characteristics of the absorption heat pump.

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human comfort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussionon the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions:two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fludic control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

name.zh: 冷凍空調自動控制實習

description.zh: 各種壓縮機起動控制、順序控制、溫度控制、濕度控制、水流量控制、外氣控制、焓值控制、氣壓控制、電動控制、電子控制等實習。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of compressor control, sequence control, temperature control, humidity control, flow control, outdoor air control, enthalpy control, and pneumatic control, electric control, electronic control on HVAC systems.

description.zh: 本課程利用範例文章閱讀、分析訓練學生寫作能力，從段落發展成為完整組織的作文。其中包括標題句、段落、各類文體，並加強句型變化，及高階文法概念。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to develop reading and writingskills from paragraph to composition with the modeled samples.  The texts  include the reading and writing of topic sentence, paragraph development, and the introduction to various styles of composition with a view to reinforce sentences  variety and advanced grammatical ideas.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括通風系統基礎，工業通風，排煙設計，空氣過濾、送風系統設計及安裝與測試，以系統設計為重點。
description.en: The contents of this course include the fundamentals of ventilation system, industrial ventilation, exhaust design, air filtration, air moving system design, construction and testing, the focus of this course is on the system design.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 冷凍空調概論、基礎知識與定義、空氣熱力學、基本冷凍循環與應用分析、壓縮理論及壓縮機性能分析、冷凍空調系統組成-壓縮機、冷凝器、冷媒控制器、蒸發器、冷凍介質－冷媒、二次冷媒吸收劑及冷凍油、冷媒管路及配件、空調處理過程及空調維護分析。
description.en: Refrigeration & air conditioning IntroductionFundamentals & definitionsPsychrometricsBasic refrigeration cycles & application analysisCompression cycle theory & performance of compressorsCompression system compositions- compressor, condenser, refrigerant controlsCooling mediums- refrigerants, secondary refrigerants, absorbents, refrigeration oils.Refrigerant piping & assessories.Air conditioning processes & cycles analysis.

description.zh: (1)基本電路元件介紹; (2)基本電路理論回顧; (3)半導體特性介紹; (4)半導體二極體電路分析技巧; (5)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (6)其他特殊二極體:發光二極體,齊納二極體,…; (7)雙極接合面電晶體工作原理; (8)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (9)雙極接合面電晶體交流小信號電路分析; (10)場效電晶體之分類:接合面型,金氧半增強型,金氧半衰減型,金氧半垂直型,金氧半互補型; (11)場效電晶體工作原理; (12)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (13)場效電晶體交流小信號電路分析
description.en: (1) Introduction to basic circuit components; (2)The review of basic circuit theories; (3)Introduction to the characteristics of semiconductors; (4)Circuit analysis techniques for semiconductor PN diode; (5)The applications of PN diode: Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (6)Special diodes: Light emitting diode(LED), Zener diode, etc.; (7)The operation principles of bipolar junction transistor(BJT); (8)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (9)Small signal analysis for BJT circuits; (10)The classification of field effect transistor(FET): JFET, Enhancement-MOS, Depletion-MOS, VMOS, and CMOS; (11)The operation principles of FET; (12)DC bias circuits for FETs; (13)Small signal analysis for FET circuits

description.zh: (1)基本儀器介紹; (2)戴維寧定理; (3)電阻-電容移相電路; (4)電阻-電容-電感諧振電路; (5)半導體二極體特性曲線; (6)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (7)發光二極體驅動電路; (8)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (9)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (10)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (11)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (12)共射極放大電路; (13)射極隨耦電路; (14)共基極定電流源電路; (15)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (16)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (17)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (18)場效電晶體放大電路
description.en: (1) Introduction to basic instruments; (2)Thevenin Theorem; (3)RC phase shifting circuits; (4)RLC resonant circuits; (5)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (6)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (7)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (8)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (9)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (10)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (11)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (12)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (13)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (14)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (15)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (16)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (17)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (18)The amplifying circuits of FETs

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en: This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh: 管路處理、焊接設備及焊接練習、空氣性質測定、冷媒性質測定、基本冷凍循環實習、冷凍系統處理、基本冷凍機電路實習、基本冷凍系統組件之配置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of working with tubing, using with oxyacetylene brazing equipment, air properties measurement, identifying refrigerant by T-P curve, evacuating a system, charging and testing a system, wiring of basic electrical circuit and control circuit.

description.zh: 網路拓樸理論及特立勤定理；節點與網路分析；迴路與切集分析；狀態變數法；自然頻率；網路函數；雙埠網路；計算機輔助分析（PSPICE）；傅氏分析；拉氏轉換。
description.en: 1. The power of single phase and poly- phase, and complex    frequency and power factor correction; the phasor    conception to the Damped sinusoidal forcing function.2. The resonant of frequency response, quality factor and    the width of a resonance     response curve of half-power    frequencies.3. Magnetically coupled circuits and Two-port networks.4. Fourier Analysis and Laplace Transform Techniques.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes : 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series, 12.Ordinary Differential Equation.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一、第二定律、各種動力循環以及冷凍循環。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts and abilities of analyzing energy forms, energy transformation, properties of substance, first law & second law of thermodynamics, power cycles, refrigeration cycles and heat pump cycles.

description.zh: DOS命令，物件導向程式語言Turbo C++整合發展環境，條件與迴圈，陣列與指標，函數，結構，類別與物件，檔案，溢載及繼承關係，文字視窗的應用，繪圖的應用，資料處理的應用，資料結構的應用，數位信號處理的應用，數值分析的應用。
description.en: The course intends to have students to be familiar with computer language programming. It also introduces different computer languages with the purpose of developing student's capability of designing a complete program.

description.zh: 本課程將從基本空調相關之冷媒化學理論入門，藉由各種冷媒系統之氣、液相臨界溫度、壓力與比容積等性質，各純成份與混合物之熱力學性質、蒸氣壓與相變化焓值，標準自由能形成，熱容、表面張力、黏度、熱傳導、擴散係數以及相平衡等因素，探討比較各別冷煤系統化學上之外延及內含性質。
description.en: This course presents a critical review of various estimation procedures for a limited number of properties of gases and liquids: Critical and other pure component properties, PVT and thermodynamic properties of pure components and mixtures, vapor pressures, and phase-change enthalpies, standard enthalpies of formation, standard gibbs energies, thermal conductivity, diffusion coefficients, and phase equilibrium. Comparison of experimental and estimated values are normal shown in tables to indicate reliability.

description.zh: 教授立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖、零件／組合圖及各式剖面變位圖之能力；並能正確標註尺寸及加工表面符號，公差與配合。並且熟悉交線展開之原理，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views, parts/assembly drawings and cross-sectional views. Learning to mark dimensions, manufacturing surface symbols tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarize the intersections and development theorem in order to draw the steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices as the standard engineering drawings.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 電力系統之矩陣表示法，稀疏矩陣解題技巧，電力潮流分析，快速及特殊作用之電力潮流分析，經濟調度，故障研究，電力系統穩定性。
description.en: Power system matrix, Power flow studies, fast decouple power flow, optimal Dispatch, Fault Studies, Power system stability

description.zh: 1. 交流電機模型2. 磁場導向控制3. 電流型變頻器控制4. 電壓型變頻器控制5. 控制器參數調整6. 交流電機轉速估測
description.en: 1. MODELLING OF AC DRIVES2. VECTOR CONTROL OF AC DRIVES3. CURRENT SOURCE INVERTER CONTROL4. VOLTAGE SOUR INVERTER CONTROL5. PARAMETER TUNING OF CONTROLLER6. SPEED ESTIMATION OF AC DRIVES

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.en: 1. probability space2. Random variable, vectors and processes3. Expectation ,converges of random sequence and Law of large number4. Stationary processes and ergodic propertis5. Useful random processes

description.en: 1. Introduction 2. System Requirements and Specification Analysis 3. System Design and Implementation 4. System Testing 5. System Maintenance 6. Software Reliability

description.zh: 這門課程主要是介紹資料庫系統的理論與應用，內容包含有： 1. 資料庫系統的介紹與架構 2. ER 資料模式 3. 檔案儲存結構 4. 關連式資料模式 5. SQL 查詢語言 6. ER資料模式與關連式資料模式之間的轉換 7. 資料庫正規化 8. 最佳化查詢 9. 交易處理
description.en: This course provides introduction to both database system theory and application. These are the following : o 1. Database System Concepts and Architecture -2. Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship Model --3. Record Storage and Primary File Organizations -4. -The Relational Data Model -5. SQL -6. ER- and ERR-to Relational Mapping -7. Functional Dependencies and Normalization for Relational Databases -8. Query Processing and Optimization -9. Transaction Processing Concepts

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與Z-轉換2. 取樣原理3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換4. 數位濾波器系統設計5. 同位訊號處理6. 時變訊號處理-短時域傅式轉換7. 離散時間隨機程序8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Robust Control 的理論基礎與其應用，其目的在使同學能具有分析不定參數系統之能力。 主要內容包括: 不定參數數學模式建立、線性分式轉換、Lyapunov 分析。此外，強健控制中常用的H∞ 控制及μ合成技術亦將在課程中介紹。
description.en: 1. Introduction.2. Mathematical preliminaries for robust control.3. Uncertainty modeling4. Lyapunov analysis5. H∞ control6. μ synthesis7.  Case studyThis is an advanced course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to analyze linear systems with varying uncertainties. Concepts such as uncertainty, linear fractional transformation, and Lyapunov analysis are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also introduces the H∞ control and the μ synthesis techniques which are the main streams in the robust control.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種常用之進階影像處理理論，課程內容含蓋：１. 空間域影像強化２. 頻域影像強化３. 影像還原４. 彩色影像處理５. 型態學影像處理６.影像分割 7. 物件辨認 8. 小波理論
description.en: This course contains the advanced topics in digital image compression. It includes １Image Enhancement in Spatial Domain ２. Image Enhancement in Frequency Domain ３. Image Restoration ４.Color Image Processing ５. Morphological Image Processing ６. Image Segmentation 7. Object Recognition 8. Wavelet and Multiresolution Processing

description.en: 1. Introduction of Power Electronic Circuit 2.Circuit Planning and Design 3. Dynamic Analysis and Control 4. Harmonic Analysis and Switching Technique 5. Power Integrated Circuit 6. Power Electronic Circuit System.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程，假定他們未具生物學的背。生物程序是應用工程原理，來設計，發展以及採用生物催化劑來解析程序。這些程序可得很多結果，諸如生產期望化合物或分解破壞不要的有害的物質。工程的工具，尤其化學工程將會成功拓展生物程序所必須。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledges of bioprocessing to traditional chemical engineers. No background in biology is assumed. Biopocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze process using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The touls of the engineer, particularly the chemical engineer will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 本課程探討傳統化工分離程序在生化製程中產品回收與存化之應用與差異，包括高速離心、膜過濾、細胞破碎、蛋白質沉澱、萃取、吸附、電泳、結晶、管柱層析與乾燥等。
description.en: This course discusses the applications of the traditional chemical engineering separation techniques to the recover and purification of the products in biochemical processes. Filtration, centrifugation, cell disruption, extraction, adsorption, elution chromatography, precipitation, electrophoresis, crystallization, and drying are introduced.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
