description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Photo- Electronic Materials.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為.
description.en: introduction to gem identification

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 一、地質資料之收集分析與應用二、大地應力分析量測方法。三、地下坑室設計。四、地下坑室施工。五、監測與管理。
description.en: 一、Collection analysis and application of geological data二、Geotechnical stress analysis and measurement。三、Underground excavation design。四、Underground excavation operation。五、Monitoring and management。

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程依物理處理技術、化學處理技術、生化處理技術以及高溫處理技術等四個方向介紹處理的基本原理與方法。
description.en: This class divide the mineral processing into four categories, i.e., physical process, chemical process, biochemical process, and high temperature process.  The basic principles and processing techniques that can be applied to the mineral processing will be discussed extensively.

description.zh: 電子電路實習：電路板製作、簡單電路設計、高頻電路響應、低頻電路響應、放大器與穩定性、振盪器、濾波器、功率電路、相關實習。
description.en: Electrical circuit Lab: Layer out, simple circuit design, high frequency circuit, and low frequency circuit response, magnifier, the stability of magnifier, oscillator, filter and power circuit lab.

description.zh: 電腦輔助製造實習、數控工具機實習:數值控制工具機夾具、刀具及量測實習、CNC程式設計及實習及電腦模擬。
description.en: Computer aided manufacturing practice, NC machine practice: NC machine tool, fixture, cutting tool, measurement, computer aided programming and cutting of machine parts on NC machine tool.

description.zh: 偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

description.zh: 機構、機械設計、古典動力學、熱力學第一定律及熱平衡、潤滑與摩擦、機械加工、機電系統匹配、機械負載等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Mechanism and Mechanical design, Classical Dynamics, Thermal Analysis, lubrication and wear, Mechatronic system design and practice.

description.zh: 電機機械、電力系統設計與匹配、電動機驅動與設計、光電原理等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Basic Electrical Engineering training for students with Mechanical Engineering major. The goal of this course is to get familiar with the building blocks of electrical systems in Mechatronic applications. Major topics include Electrical machines, Motor Drives, Power Amplifiers, Power Electronics, and OP-Amp related signal processing circuits. Lectures are given to illustrate the function of the each block in electrical systems. And then the students can conduct experiment to explore relevant circuits in order to obtain thorough understanding of their characteristics.

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

description.zh: 基礎流體力學原理及實驗、比例閥、伺服元件、電液元件及比較、伺服驅動器設計等實驗(作)。
description.en: A general background in fluid mechanic and use of mechanical laboratory machinery equipment. The course Hydrau-servo Systems introduces the varied aspects of Pneumatic and Hydraulic Servo System Servo and Proportional Valves, Electro-hydraulic Servo-valves, Electro-hydraulic Servomechanisms and Hydra-mechanical Servo-mechanisms. The course in programming is one third time of lectures and the other of laboratory practices.

name.en: Advanced Application of Sensor and Transducer in Mechatronic

description.zh: 感測器及傳感器之設計與製造、訊號處理迴路設計、感測器內部電路之逆向工程、感測器與與機械設計、感測器之應用與匹配。
description.en: Principle of Sensors and Transducers, Design of sensing element, Signal Conditioning Circuit Design, Mechanical Design and Packaging of sensor, Fabrication of sensor, Selection and Application of the sensors.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹平行處理的理論﹑硬体技術及可擴充式平行計算機結構1. 平行理論:．平行計算機模型．程式及網路特性．系統性能計算2. 硬体技術．超能量處理器．ＶＬＩＷ架構．向量處理器．共享式記憶体架構．超管線處理器3. 平行計算機結構．多重處理器系統．多向量處理器及ＳＩＭＤ電腦．多線式處理器．資料流處理器架構
description.en: This course introduces the following topics of parallel processing:theory of parallelism ,Hardware technologies,and parallel Architecture.The detail for each topic is as follows:  1.Theory of parallelism  .parallel computer model   .program and Network properties  .principles of scalable performance2. Hardware technology .superscalar processor .VLIW Architecture .Vector processor .shared memory organization .superpipelined processor3. Parallel architecture .multiprocessor system .multivector and SIMD computers .multithread architecture Dataflow architecture

description.zh: 本課程再使學生瞭解灰色系統的理論及原理，進而培養學生能運用該灰色系統之理論於資訊系統，控制系統，影像處理，糢糊控制，類神經網路，醫學，工業，經濟及管理等領域之應用：課程內容包含：1.灰色系統介紹 2.灰色關聯度分析 3.灰色預測原理4.灰色建模 5.灰色系統的應用 6.實例學習
description.en: This course is introduced the principle and theory of grey ststem. Therefore, the student can be used the grey systemapplied to information sytem, control system, image processing,fuzzy control, neural network, medicine, industry,economy,and manaement,etc..The contents of this course is:1.The introduction of grey system 2.Grey relational analysis 3.the theory of grey prediction 4.the grey modeling 5.The application of grey system 6.Case study

description.zh: 1.電磁理論 2.格林函數 3.橫向電磁波 4.傳輸線 5.金屬波導 6.介質波導 7.不連續波導結構 8.波模激發
description.en: 1.Electromanetic theory 2.Green's functins3.Transverse Electromagnetic wave4.Transmission lines5.Metallic waveguides6.Dielectric waveguides7.Waveguide discontinuities8.Excitation of waveguides

description.zh: 1.高頻介質材料特性 2.介質共振器簡介 3.圓柱型介電波導理論4.簡易共振模型分析法 5.精密分析法 6.介質共振器耦合特性7.介質共振器之高頻電路應用
description.en: 1.The Characteristics of High-frequency Dielectric Materials2.The Introduction of Dielectric Resonators3.Theory of Cylindrical Dielectric Waveguides4.Simple Resonate Model for Analysis5.Rigorous Analysis Methods6.The Characteristis of Coupling7.The DR's Practical applications at High Frequencies

description.zh: 1.電子產品設計概要與商品價值觀2.電子零件之深層特性及選用3.電子產品之穩定性、可靠度及精確度4.雜訊、偏離電壓、飽和切削與動態範圍對產品性能之影響5.設計步驟與設計方法6.輸入電路之設計7.印刷電路迴路之設計8.輸出電路之設計9.電子電路最佳化設計與折衷10.多例電子產品設計例
description.en: 1.Introduction on electronic product design and concept on    commercial value2.Advanced characteristics and selection of electronic parts3.Stability,reliability,and accuracy of electronic product4.Influence of noise,offset voltage,clipping,and dynamic     range on product's features5.Design steps & design methods6.Input circuit design7.PCB loop design8.Output circuit design9.Optimization and tradeoff of electronic circuit design10.Miscellaneous examples of electronic product design

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of adresses discussion,oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evallution and repairing,soil and water disaster prevention.urban precaution,fire fighting,construction safety,enviromental planning and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹1.變分法        2.線性彈性力學       3.變分法應用到彈性力學4.Euler梁與Timoshenko梁      5.扭力    6.古典板理論7.彈性穩定.
description.en: This course will introduces:1.Calculus of Variations2.Linear Elasticity3.Variational Principles of Elasticity4.Euler Beam and Timoshenko Beam5.Torsion6.Classical Theory of Plates7.Elastic Stability

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 岩石力學是一門綜合應用地質,地球物理,礦冶,石油與土木工程等科目而成之學科,其範圍包含有岩石力學性質,岩體受擾動後之各種應力分析技術,岩體受力後之反應原理,以及應用已建立之岩石力學觀念與技術於實際之問題上,而一般能源的取得與發展,交通建設,水資源與國防設施,地震預測,以及其他重要之建設等各方面技術,經常也與岩石力學相關,本課程包含:1.岩石力學概述        2.應力與應變    3.岩石分類與物理性質4.岩石強度與破壞準則  5.岩石變形      6.岩石初始應力與其量測7.岩石地下工程        8.岩石邊坡工程  9.岩石基礎工程
description.en: Rock mechanics is a truly interdisciplinary subject,with applications in geology and geophysics,mining petroleum.and civil engineering.It is composed of a body of knowledge of the mechanical properties of rocks,various techniques for the analysis of rock stresses under some imposed perturbation,a set of established principles expressing rock mass response to load,and a logical scheme for applying these notions and techniques to real physical problems.It relates to energy recovery and development,construction of transportation,water resources and defense facilities,construction of nuclear waste,prediction of earthquakes and many other activities of greatest importance. The course will cover the basic theory and applications with the rock mechanics in this semester. It is organized into three parts:basic concepts,properties of rocks,and applications of rock engineering. The specific course content properties of rocks,and aapplications of rock engineering.

description.zh: 本課程將針對如何從土壤動力試驗評估土壤的動態力學參考數導入,作為理論解或者數值解的輸入值,以預測土壤在震動下的變形行為,以及分析土壤與結構物的動態互制行為.內容包括:波傳遞理論,土壤的動力性質,土壤的液化,基礎的振動問題,等等..
description.en: This course will teach how to evaluate the soil's dynamic material properties by means of dynamic laboratory testing.Based on the analytical and numerical solution,the behaviour of soil-structure dynamic interaction can be predicted.

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: This course includes the subjects of making a computer system, which has the capability of solving problems intelligently, storaging knowledge reasoning, recognition, vision, representation, learning, perception, and analyzing problems.

description.zh: 1950年代間，美國火箭太空計畫，如火如荼地推動，從概念、設計、製造、組裝，到實驗測試，各次合約商莫不積拯地為其負責之子系統排除萬難，以達到成功發射的目標。經過全體人員之通力合作，火箭順利成功發射。但當合約商再獲量產合約為興之餘，卻發散無法製作第二個相同成功發射之火箭，乃因為工程人員在製造設計現場，針對製品之即時工程修改，未留下完整之修改記錄，因此「型態管理」之作為發展出來。為配合現代之環境，本課程內容包含：一、型態認定二、型態管制三、介面管制四、型態現況反映五、型態稽核六、次合約商/供應商之管制
description.en: The configuration management text wii present the full scope of conifguration identification ,configuration contrpl, status accounting, and configuration adicts and clearly establish the interrelationship between rhe elements of the discipline.

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在研習多媒體的資訊管理技術及其在商業自動化與生產系統的應用，課程內容包括:1. 多媒體資料形式與儲存方式之研究2. 網路多媒體資料傳輸方式之研究3. 分散式多媒體資料管理技術之研究4. 多媒體管理資訊系統之研究5. 超媒體資料管理之研究6. 網際網路多媒體資訊管理之研究7. 企業內網路多媒體資訊管理之研究8. 多媒體技術在商業自動化之應用9. 多媒體技術在生產系統之應用
description.en: The Multimedia Information Management Course is to study the techniques for managing multimedia information and its applications on the commerce automation and production systems. The course includes the following topics:1. Multimedia information format and storage policy2. Network flow management for multimedia information3. Distributed multimedia information management techniques4. Multimedia management information systems5. Hypermedia information management techniques6. World wide web multimedia information management    techniques7. Intranet multimedia information

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的運用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化，標準化，以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境。
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commerical environment. Also, by applying the buisness procedure re-engineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，其中包括：一因子實驗 ‧區集和拉丁方格 ‧不完全區集設計 ‧多因子實驗 ‧部份因子實驗 ‧巢狀或階層實驗 ‧變異數分析 ‧迴歸分析 ‧交互變異分析
description.en: Introduce the experiment design methods and conclusion. Such as: one factor experiment, Latin square, Multi factors experiment, ANOVA, regression.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 行銷看待是設計工程─它的組合由集成資料、模式、分析和電腦模擬設計一個有效的行銷規劃。我們的教學焦點：l 定義及介紹行銷工程與網路行銷l 策略性行銷l 戰術性行銷l 結合傳統行銷概念和新的網路行銷包括討論、遞送和技術。
description.en: Marketing resembles design engineering ─it consists of putting together data, models, analysis, and computer simulations to design effective marketing plans. We focus on：l Define marketing engineering and internet marketing plans.l Strategic marketing.l Tactical marketing.l Includes discussion, tips and techniques for combining   traditional marketing concepts with new web market methods.

description.zh: 本課程提供生產系統與管理研究所碩士班有關數量方法的核心課程。它敘述各種觀念，計量方法及控制在各種不同產業的應用。本課程不需特別數學先修課程。
description.en: This course is intended primarily for use in the quantitative methods course as a core requirement in master's degree program of system engineering and management .It draws upon a broad and varied industrial base as a fame of reference for the application of concepts , analytical techniques ,and controls . This course does not require any previous college-level mathematical background.

name.en: Analysis and Design of Manufacturing Systems

description.zh: 本課程講授生產系統物理模態之建立方法，模擬並且分析生產系統，探討最佳化製造參數之取得，以提高產品品質。
description.en: Modeling material handling systems, inventory systems, and production systems for performance analysis. Introduction to analysis, simulation, and physical models of manufacturing systems. Optimization of manufacturing parameters to achieve high production quality. Reinforce manufacturing principles, procedures, and methods.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統製造法之物理原理，包括機械能、電能、熱能與化學能，探討各種非傳統製造法之機構以及物理參數，本課程所講授之非傳統製造法：高壓水刀加工、超音波加工、電化學加工、蝕刻加工、放電加工、雷射加工、電子束加工、電漿加工以及快速原型製造法。
description.en: Introduction to the principle of non-traditional manufacturing processes include mechanical energy, electrical energy, thermal energy, and chemical energy. Study the mechanism of non-traditional machining processes and its physical parameters. Non-traditional manufacturing processes include: Ultra-high Pressure Water-jet Machining, Ultrasonic Machining, Electrochemical Machining, Photo-Etching, EDM, EBM, LBM, PAM, Chemical Machining, and Rapid Prototyping.

description.zh: 本課程內容系利用圖形(Graph)架構網路(Network)之理論探討。課程中對圖形之路徑及距離等之探索外並介紹各種不同圖形如：Eulerian ,  Hamiltonian ,planar , Coloring等題型之求解。
description.en: The major propose of this course is to analyze the networks by using the Graphs algorithms. As well as the paths and distances in graph have been explored, the varieties of the problem such as Eulerian, Hamiltonian , Planar, Coloring have been solved.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹電腦控制在製程上之應用，深入研究電腦輔助製程規劃、同步工程，探討設計與測試之關係、設計與組裝之關係與整合、CAD/CAM界面設計、自動化檢測以及電腦整合製造。
description.en: This course will describe the real-time application of microcomputer systems to problems in manufacturing. In-depth study of automated and Computer Aided Process Planning (CAPP). Concepts, requirements, limitations, examples and implementation procedures of concurrent engineering, Just-In-Time Production System (JIT), design for testability, design for assembly, process selection, interface to CAD/CAM, and computer-integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用
description.en: Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Control theory

description.zh: 最小平方法，最大可能法，自動遞迴模型，馬可夫參數估測，狀態空間實現，時域數據的系統判別，頻域數據的系統判別
description.en: Least Square Method, Maximum Likelihood Method, Auto Regressive Model, Estimation of Markov Parameter, State-Space Realization, System Identification based on Time Domain Test Data, System Identification based on Frequency Domain Test Data.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 變分法，積分方程式， Green函數，高等複變，asymptotic展開，微擾法
description.en: Calculus of Variations and Application, Integral Equations, Green Function, Advance Complex Variables, Asymptotic Expansion of Integrals, Purturbation Methods

description.zh: 本課程包括下列主題:網路商業環境和未來發展, 網路行銷,網路公關,網路商店之經營, 及線上廣告交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safety.

description.zh: 機率,隨機變數及特性,隨機序列的收斂性及大數法則,高斯隨機變數及隨機陣列,穩定性隨機程序及功率頻譜,一些有用的隨機程序及濾波器。
description.en: Probability,random variable its properties, the convergence of random sequence and law of large number, Gaussian random variables and random vectors, stationary random process and spectrum, some useful random procwssws and filters.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 本課程介紹冷凍工程學之原理及設備實務，著重在學理之教導。課程內容為（1） 冷凍系統與蒸汽壓縮機系統（2） 冷凍循環與真實冷凍循環（3） 冷凍工程之應用（4） 冷凍系統設備（5） 系統平衡與循環控制（6） 冷媒化學與配管（7） 除霜
description.en: The theory and equipment of refrigeration engineering is introduced in this course.  The topics are:(1) Refrigeration and vapor compression systems.(2) Cycle diagrams and actual refrigerating cycles.(3) Survey of refrigeration applications.(4) Components and equipment of refrigeration systems.(5) System equilibrium and cycling controls.(6) Refrigerants and piping.(7) Defrost.

description.zh: 在 -50°C到 -100°C溫度範圍內，是工業冷凍和生物基因晶化工程領域常被應用到的低溫系統技術。主要是利用混合型冷媒之不同沸點差異，利用蒸汽壓縮機進行多段壓縮循環，如此，可在壓縮比到相當程度時，吸收器具有到達 -60°C或 -70°C的能力。相對地，壓縮機之壓力有時需達特定之高壓或真空狀態，以維持低溫製造能力。故低溫系統技術是工業食品與現代醫藥生物科技之關鍵項目。本課程包含下列各項內容︰1. 低溫冷媒物循環特性。2. 低溫與真空系統循環技術。3. 多段式低溫冷凍熱交換特性。4. 低溫與真空裝置材料選擇。5. 低溫冷媒物熱傳導熱力學特性。6. 其他各種低溫系統技術應用。
description.en: At the completion Low-temperature & Vacuum Systems Technology of this course, students will be to grasp the followings:1. Refrigerants for low-temperature circuit2. Low-temperature refrigeration cycles technologies.3. Heat transfer characteristics of multi-stage low-temperature refrigeration.4. Choice of construction materials in the low-temperature systems.5. Thermodynamic properties of low-temperature refrigerants.6. Application technologies for low-temperature & vacuum systems.

name.en: Analysis and modeling of air distribution

description.zh: 非黏性流場分析，氣流質量、動量與能量守恆統御方程式，熱浮力分析，氣流模型分析，紊流之理論基礎分析，紊流之解析方程式，數值分析方法簡介
description.en: Inviscid flow distribution, mass conservation, momentum conservation, energy conservation, analysis of buoyancy effects, flow modeling, turbulence basics, solutions to turbulence flows, introduction to numerical methods.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

name.en: Non-eelctric Power Air Cond. Energy saving Tech.

description.zh: 非電力空調節能技術在與傳統利用機械壓縮式系統比較下，具有實質提供冷熱與電力的低成本、高效率之最佳經濟上特性。本課程內容將涵蓋： 1.吸收式系統技術 2.各式燃料電池﹝Fuel Cell﹞的連結應用技術 3.氫氣引擎的應用 4.MHD-磁動力流體發電技術 5.各種非電力空調技術評估 6.系統的最適化設計
description.en: The overall purpose of Non-electric Power Air Cond. Energy Saving Technology: 1.The Concept of Absorption Heat pump tech. 2.Fuel Cell System integration with Cogen. Sys. 3.Hydro-engine utilization tech. 4.Tech.of M.H.D. power generation. 5.Evaluation Tech for Non-electric Power Air Cond. Sys. 6.Optimize Design of Non -electric Power Air Cond. Sys.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 企業研究的本質、科學方法、研究之概念基礎、理論與研究、研究之概念基、礎、研究問題與假設、文獻參考與研究變數、操作性定義之建立、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、研究草案、調查研究法、問卷法、訪問研究法、歷史文憲法與觀察法、個案研究法、量表法、實驗法、資料之分析法、單變量分析與一般統計分析、多變量分系、資料的解釋、研究報告、企業研究與決策之應用。
description.en: The nature of business research、scientific method、conceptual foundations of research、theory and research、elements of research and research process、research problem and hypothesis、literature review and variable of research、constructing operational definitions、measurement、modeling theoretical structures、research design、 research proposal、survey research、questionnaires、interview technique、documentary historical method and observation、case study、scaling、experiment、data analysis、univariate analysis and general statistical analysis、multivariate analysis、the interpretation of data、research report、policy implication of business research

description.zh: 資訊管理是一門較新的管理學門，在電腦早期發展時期，只有專業電腦人員才會懂得如何操作電腦，但隨著資訊科技的進步，個人電腦的普及，一般非資訊人員也可以很容易操作與使用電腦。然而會用電腦不見的對企業有所幫助，思考資訊科技如何給企業帶來競爭優勢是資訊管理領域所考慮的重要議題。一般來說，資訊管理主要探討企業如何對資訊系統及資訊人員作最有效的管理，以其與企業目標結合，替企業增加競爭優勢。本課程即站在管理與策略的角度分析企業應如何對資訊資源（包括資料、資訊系統與資訊人員）做最有效的管理，上課方式將採用個案研討為主，以期學生能瞭解理論與實務的發展。
description.en: This course will discuss how the organizations gain their competitive advantage through Information Technology. It covers the following three major parts: Part 1:Information System Planning. Part 2: Information System Management in the Organization. Part 3: Strategic use of Information System Part 4:Electronic Commerce and strategic impact.

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 說明專案投資之經濟分析與評估，內容:專案投資模式、專案分析準則、投資風險分析、不確定性環境下的投資策略
description.en: This course is to interpret the economic analysis and evaluation of investment project. The main topics include project investment models, project criteria, investment risk analysis, investment decision under uncertainty.

description.zh: 課程旨再探討有關物流系統建構到作業中各項管理問題，如物流中心之規劃、EIQ分析、物流中心之作業系統、配送管理、及資訊管理等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the related issues about the construction to operation for logistic system ，such as distribution center planning ，EIQ analysis，the operation system of distribution center ，distribution management ，and information management etc .

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 辦公室自動化課程內容包含(1)辦公室自動化介紹;(2)辦公室效率評估;(3) 辦公室自動化的推展;(4)如何提高辦公室自動化效益; (5)辦公室業務介紹;(6)行政部門的辦公室自動化;(7)業務部門的辦公室自動化;(8)辦公室自動化的技術介紹;(9)白領階級如何麵對辦公室自動化;(10)辦公室自動化個案討論。
description.en: In the course of office automation, the following topics will be included as (1) Introduction of office automation; (2) Efficiency analysis of office automation; (3) Developments of office automation; (4) How to promote the effectiveness of office automation; (5) Introduction of office affairs; (6) Office automation of administration; (7) Office automation of sales department; (8) Tools of Office automation; (9) Impacts of officers; (10) Case study.

description.zh: 網路資料庫課程的目的在研習網路系統中的資料庫管理技術與其在企業的應用, 主要課程方向含括基本網路理論、網路資料庫設計理論、網路資料庫在管理資訊系統與決策支援系統的應用、全球資訊網網路資料庫實例探討,課程內容包括 1.基本網路架構 2.資料通訊理論 3.主從架構理論 4.關係式資料庫設計技術 5.多媒體資料處理技術 6.網路資料安全與資料保密理論 7.網路資料庫在管理資訊系統實際應用探討 8.網路資料庫在決策支援系統實際應用探討 9.全球資訊網網路資料庫設計實例探討
description.en: The networked database course is to study the database management techniques in the networked environment and its applications on enterprises. The course focuses on the study of basic network theories, networked database design techniques, applications of networked database techniques on management information systems and decision support systems and world wide web database applications. The course encompasses the following topics:1.Basic network architecture; 2.Data communication theories; 3.Client/Server system theories; 4.Relational database design techniques; 5.Multimedia data processing; 6.Network data security theories; 7.Applications of networked database systems on management information systems; 8.Applications of networked database systems on decision support systems; 9.World wide web networked database systems applications.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列主題：網路商業環境和未來發展，網路行銷，網路公關，網路商店之經營，線上廣告及交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safty.

description.zh: 本課程利用要徑法教導學生管理一項專案有關時間及成本的估計，進度表，預算編列等技巧，及其它監督控制一項專案進行之措施。專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。課程內容包含：（1）專案的定義和辨認，（2）專案可行性研究和選擇條件，（3）專案進度表編排，（4）專案之預算與成本控制，（5）限制性資源之編排與調配，（6）專案評核與檢討技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the technique of Critical Path Method (CPM) to manage a project in terms of time / cost estimation, scheduling, budgeting, and other control / monitoring measures on the performance of a project. The role of project manager in an organization will also be discussed. Topics to be covered are: (1) Concept and identification of a project, (2) Project feasibility study and selection criteria, (3) Project scheduling, (4) Budgeting and cost control, (5) Constrained resource scheduling and leveling, and (6) Project evaluation and review technique.

description.zh: 課程包含下列主題：(1)知識經濟導論(2)知識產業分析(3)知識經濟發展模式(4)知識管理VS.知識經濟(5)知識成本評估模式(6)知識經濟管理參考模式
description.en: This course includes following topics: (1) the introduction of Knowledge economics, (2) the analysis of knowledge industry, (3) the development model for knowledge economics, (4) knowledge management vs. knowledge economics, (5) Intellectual cost evaluation model, (6) knowledge economics reference model.

description.zh: 網路環境具有互動性,虛擬經驗等,因此消費行為有別於傳統環境之下,本課程首先探討傳統市場與電子市場之經濟分析,接著探討網路消費者行為理論，虛擬社群,虛擬經驗,網路廣告與互動品質.互動行銷技術, 顧客服務管理, 顧客關係層次,交易成本理論,網路行銷企業模式,互動技術顧客關係.
description.en: Consumer behavior on the net is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, consumer behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The course will focus on theory of neural network. Related jurnal article will be discussed.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含SPSS、ERIC及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 教學評量範圍、目的、沿革與發展，評量策略、評量結果分析及應用。
description.en: Application of personal computer to processes of classroom measurement and testing; test writing, scoring and evaluation based on computer use.

description.zh: 學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；學習領域的探索，學習效果影響變項的探索；學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
description.en: Course Description: This course provides an overview of contemporary learning theories and research methodology on learning. Topics include behavioral approaches to learning , cognitive approaches to learning , and other related learning theories, types of learning, variables that affect learning, and applications of learning theories.

description.zh: 教育行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究。
description.en: Historical background of the theories of educational administration; theories of school social system ; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency.

name.zh: 實習工場管理與安全研究

description.zh: 深入探討技職學校實習工場如何進行、規劃、布置、管理場房、設備物料及工場人事等事項以達到教學研究及安全法規之需求。
description.en: To probe intr the peration, the planning, the setting,workshop-management, equipment, the personnel assignment,etc.of the school shop in a vocatinal school, in order to meet the need of both teaching, research and safety regulations.

name.zh: 技職教育理論與實務研究

description.zh: 剖析技職教育的基礎、本質與特性。能力本位、群集、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導等理念對技職教育的影響。並對我國技職教育發展及特有問題的背景、產生原因以及解決之道深入探討。
description.en: Objectives and foundations of technical-vocational education; structural foundations of vocational education; organization of technical-vocational education; the future of technical-vocational education.

name.zh: 技職教育課程發展研究

description.zh: 探討課程發展理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基 礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵。並進行課程評 鑑。
description.en: Trends in methodology for designing, and evaluating curriculum in technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

description.zh: （一）瞭解、預測及控制組織內工成員的行為；（二）培養積極有效管理組織內工成員的行為之基本能力。課程內容以個体、團体與組織三層次為經，行為基礎、激勵理論、個体決策、團体行為、團体決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相觀議題。課程實施方法為講解、討論、個案研究及專題討論。
description.en: Human behavior in work organizations; nature of organizations; models of organization; design work structuring; motivation and performance; group and intergroup behavior; influence processes and planned change.

name.zh: 人力資源管理專題研究
name.en: Special Topics in Human Resource Management

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前人力資源管理重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of concepts, current issues, and implication underlying from major research in human resource management. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育與訓練或人力資源領域進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of competency analysis in technical-vocational education & training program or in the field of human resource. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

name.zh: 職業分析與輔導實務研究
name.en: Practical Study of Occupation Analysis & Guidance

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of the main research in occupation analysis & guidance. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Case study, discussion, reporting are required.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育行政領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends and research in educational administration. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories and research in curriculum design of technical-vocational education. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對職業訓練領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in vocational training of technical-vocational education. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究教師專業的基本素養與評量標準，並探究教師生涯各階段專業發展的再精進策略
description.en: Critical study of the basic literacy of teachers and assessment of professional criteria. Exploration of successful strategies of professional development for teachers in different career stages.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對遠距教育領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skill and research and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in fields of distance education through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程介紹複合材料的原理，包括複合材料的高分子化學、複合材料的加工方法、複合材料的力學分析與設計、以及複合材料在高科技上的應用。加工方法包括真空袋成型法、壓力釜成形法、樹脂移送成型、編織法、纏繞成形法、拉擠成型法、模壓法…等，本課程詳述這些加工方法的原理及應用，同時介紹力學分析及設計，應力和應變之關係，複材之彎曲、靜態和動態之強度、脫層、耐久性、及以力學觀點設計複合材料，最後討論複合材料如何應用於高科技及民生工業上。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the principle and potential application of composite materials. It includes polymer chemistry, design and analysis of composite, and processing methods. The composite processings include autoclaves,vacuum vags, resin transform molding, braiding, filament winding, pultrusions, sheet molding compound,…etc. The principles and application of the methods will be elucidated. The analysis and design, strain-stress relationships, extension and bending, static and dynamic strengths, and delamination, will also be discussed. Finally, the potential application of the composite in high-tech industries will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (I)

description.zh: 總課程目標：     在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非      實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研一課程目標：          了解理論與實踐之理性關係，其對象應包含自實質至非實質環      境。 課程概要：     利用不同設計課題就學員原有專長實際操作其自理論至實踐之      因果關係。此階段較偏向對目標之了解，就各學員所選定課題      完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程書面資料，以接受目      標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course :   Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn   to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and   practice in both substantial and non-substantial   environments. 1st GradeThrough manipulation of different design topics,   the disciples learn to understand the relational   relationship between theory and practice in both   substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete   presentation which includes design result and a report of   the process of the ascertainment will be required for   evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken  depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1)	Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2)	Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3)	Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design	(4)	Exercise on urban design for new development area

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800年到1900年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

description.zh: 1. 女性主義理論介紹、本土婦運與婦女團體介紹2. 性別刻板印象與影響3. 生活時間、空間與性別4. 住宅與性別5. 學校環境與性別6. 都市公共空間與性別7. 交通、消費與性別8. 就業市場與性別9. 女性與休閒110. 社區發展與婦女11. 質性研究方法簡介
description.en: 1. Feminism: Theories & Its branches2. Introduction of Gender 3. Gender & Time-space of daily life4. Houses & Gender5. Education Environment & Gender6. Urban Space & Gender7. Traffic、consume & Gender8. Gender & work9. Women & Leisure10. Community Development & women11. Introduction of research method

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生應用資訊科技來加強都市規劃與設計的能力。授課的主題涵蓋：    1. 電腦科技應用於都市規劃與設計相關領域的現況    2. 都市資訊系統的內涵及功能    3. 都市資訊系統的建構方法與工具    4. 都市資訊系統的應用實例
description.en: The course is designed to help students to utilize the power of newly developed computer technology to urban planning and design applications.    The course content including:      1. Introduction of computer technology used in urban           planning and design applications.      2. The content and functions of urban information          system.      3. The methods and tools of constructing of urban              information system.      4. Some applications of urban information system.

name.en: Landscape Design Method of Regional Approach

description.zh: 景觀，從比較完整的角度來看，既是人文的，也是自然的整體表現。現代化的普及知識和普同技術帶來對自然環境的衝擊和地區景觀特色的趨同，已經使得從事景觀設計專業警覺到應該反省當前景觀設計方法和表達的適當性。自從 1960年代以來被景觀建築專業奉為圭鎳的自然環境導向的設計方法已經開始遭到質疑。本課程從地域觀點講述有關的主張與理論；尤其以台灣地區為對象探討特定地區課題，以及依此理念所發展出的這一套設計理論與方法。此一課程的設計方法將可提供有興趣選擇環境設計方向論文的同學可能的觀念性架構。    1.  當代台灣景觀設計思潮與問題    2.  地域性環境規畫設計理論    3.  地域性景觀設計的內涵    4.  地域性景觀設計方法    5.  地域性景觀設計的實務
description.en: Landscape, from a more comprehensive viewpoint, involves with either natural environment or humanistic expression. The universal knowledge and technology brought about the significant impact to environment and the tendency of universal homogeneity. Looking for more regional reflected approach to landscape design has been a concern in searching for regionally sound landscape. Landscape practice in Taiwan is unexceptional to this phenomenon at all. To underscore the regional approach the course includes the issues below;    1.  Vision and fallacy of contemporary landscape design     2.  Rationale of the regional planning and design    3.  The body of regional design in landscape    4.  Method of regional approach to landscape design    5.  The practice of regional landscape design

name.zh: 電腦在都市建築之應用

description.zh: 主要在電腦相關應用方面的加強，當作設計工具、研究主題應用和電腦圖形方法研究及開發在都市和建築等領域方面程式發展以解決研究領域之問題.
description.en: Emphasis on application of the computer as a design tool, topical applications and computer graphic methods, development of computer software for architectural and urban problem solving.

description.zh: 本課程為建築史研究及寫作的入門課程，內容主要是介紹與歷史研究有關的各種理論與方法，及其運用於建築方面的狀況，目的為訓練研習者建立個人的歷史敘事觀，與從事建築歷史寫作的能力。課程含三大部份：  1.「歷史」意義概說。  2.歷史研究理論與方法研討。  3.建築史名作敘事架構分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the historical study and academic writing on architecture. The main body relates to theories and methods concerning with historical study and the possible application in architecture. It aims at the establishment of a analytical vision and the ability in academic writing in doing research of architectural history. Three parts are concluded:  1. Defining the meaning of 'History'.  2. Exploring the theories of historical studies and            research methodologies.  3. Analyzing the structure of remarkable articles on      'architecture history'.

description.zh: 近年國內營建環境有急遽的變化，政府及民間業者亦有諸多因應措施，如營建自動化、建築生產合理化、開放營建等議題陸續出現。但由於建築學界與業界的隔閡，設計與施工的各自侷限，相關的知識一直未能有效的貫穿，以致效益不彰。建築生產過程的一貫性與完整性考量將是本課程試圖探討的重點，因此將循序漸進的選擇適當的案例，逐步引導討論進入理論分析的層次。課程內容包括：    建築生產的歷史回顧    建築生產的流程與組織    建築生產決策的影響因子    建築生產的整體評估    建築生產的動向
description.en: Our building environment has changed tragically in this year. The government and enterprises do many efforts on issues like construction automation, rationalization of building production, and open building. But the segregation between schools and practices, self-limitation of design and construction, those related knowledge was never passed down effectively, that we still stocked in there.Deal with the whole and totality in the process of building production is our major concern. The course contentsl     A historical review     Process and organization    Factors of decision    A comprehensive evaluation     Future trend

description.zh: 檢查這具有價值和道德的建築社會和這身為建築師角色的扮演當進入這決策流程的建築的組織中時, 社會的視覺影像的檢驗及文化在社會文句具體化的呈現和他們相互的關係轉換到選擇性方案的設計都市的空間與地方。學生描述在社會的分析和設計理論考慮社會的思想如何落實設計和都市的空間的運作．學生將建議可能的理論的文句來達成上述之目標外同時證明他們對設計的提議是可被檢驗的。
description.en: Examines the values and ethics of an architectural society and the input of the architect into the decision-making process of an architectural organization.  An examination of visions of society and culture embodied in social texts and their relation to the design of alternative urban spaces and places.Students draw on social analysis and design theory to consider how social thought informs design and the production of urban space.  In addition, students suggest possible theoretical texts justifying their design proposals.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要分成六項：（1）從都市歷史發展，討論過去、現在與未來；（2）以永續都市發展理論，探討都市型態及設計理論；（3）以都市空間的構成探討解讀、架構及產生的理論；（4）以都市空間的形成探討社會過程、技術過程及創造過程：（5）以都市實質設計的涵構探討都市的實質、自然及人文設計，並藉以討論土地使用、開放空間、建築形式與量體、流通動線、停車場、街道家具及支持活動等；（6）以都市設計的技術探討主要計畫、細部計畫、都市計畫通盤檢討、都市更新、土地使用分區管制及都市景觀管制等技術性課題
description.en: The subject is hereby divided into six parts (1) discussing the past, present and future from standpoint of the chronicle of urban development; (2) exploring the urban pattern and design theory be referring to on-going urban development; (3) inquiring into the theory of formation, configuration and generation and urban space; (4) searching the social process, technical process and creation process through the formation of urban space; (5) from the virtual, natural and cultural design to review the proper layout of land use, open space, building pattern and volume, flow dynamic line, parking lot, road, furniture and support for citizen activity; (6) technically reviewing the main urban plan, detail plan, overall review of urban plan, urban renewal, land use, zone control and urban landscape.

description.zh: 本課程主要藉由理論與知識的追求、比較不同領域、地區、區域、國家的政策發展，以培養吾人對公共政策的訂定、實施、觀察、分析與回饋之研究能力。其內容包括：  一、 公共政策：方法、工具與理論觀點  二、 市鎮計畫、地方計畫與公共政策  三、 住宅與都市規劃發展政策之選擇  四、 健全住宅與都市發展政策之公部門責任  五、 政府支持與公權力限制  六 、結論
description.en: The aim in this course is to utilize our experience in policy observation and analysis and, by tapping many streams of theory and knowledge, compare major tendencies in policy development between fields, areas, regions, and countries. Therefore this course including:  1. Public policy: methods, means, theoretical perspectives  2. Town planning, local planning and public policy  3. Choices in housing and urban planning policy  4. Governmental responsibilities for shelter and guiding       urban growth  5. Political support and limits to public power  6. Conclusions

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

description.zh: 本課程以探討都市再生過程中種種再開發模式及策略為主軸，透過不同類型之各國都市再開發案例進行專題討論分析比較。討論主題以當代環境主流議題為優先，包括：日本親水環境案例水岸空間開發案例綠建築與生態社區永續生態都市(歐洲生態小學案例)都市防災公園設計規劃商業空間更新（商店街、形象商圈，美國主街計劃）社區總體營造與都市更新車站周邊區域更新閒置空間、歷史街區保存與都市發展特殊產業之再開發案例介紹與解析6. 都市設計相關議題7. 民眾參與8. 管理維護組織9. 案例介紹與解析
description.en: This course regards different strategies & redevelopment types as the central concept to discuss about the issues of urban regeneration through survey different examples of different countries which consisted of several parts mentioned as below: the redevelopment projects of waterfrontthe redevelopment projects of ecology community & green buildingthe redevelopment projects of eco-citythe plan & design of disaster prevention parkthe redevelopment projects of commercial areathe redevelopment projects of station neighborhoodthe conservation of historical area the redevelopment projects of industry area

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.基礎物理觀念 2.材料的光特性 3.材料的電特性 4.能帶與接面理論 5.雷射原理 6.光纖 7.雷射輔助製造程序 8.雷射加工設備 9.雷射加工原理 10.雷射加工實例 11.干涉儀 12.雙頻干涉儀 13.幾何光學尺 14.繞射式光學尺.
description.en: 1.Fundamentals of modern physics 2.Optical properties of material 3.Electromic properties of materials 4.Theories on energy bands and junctions 5.Fundamentals of lasers 6.Fibeds 7.Laser assisted manufacturing processes 8.Facilities for laser material processing 9.The principles of laser material processing 10.Example of laser material processing 11.Interferometer 12.Optical heterodyne Interferometer 13.Optical encoder 14.Laser encoder

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   真空工程, 直流電源, 射頻電源, 微波, 熱燈絲等各種能量方式之CVD化學氣相沉積法, PVD物理氣相沉積法, 電鍍技術,以及膜的特性觀察與實驗，包括SEM，EDX，XRD與金相顯微觀察，附著力測試等。1.光電半導體V-I特性分析試驗 2.接面型光電元件C-V量測實驗 3.光導電及少數載體存活時間量測實驗 4.邁克蓀干涉儀實驗(3)5.雷射繞射實驗(3) 6.偏振實驗(3)7.分光儀實驗(3)
description.en: The practices in vacuum engineering, variety deposition methods such as CVD, PVD and electroplating, that include DC, RF, microwave hot filament etc are be performed. Tests of film properties and its characterizations such as SEM, EDX, XRD, and metallurgical microscope are also be examined.1.Experiment on V-I characteristics of photonic devices.2.C-V measurements of optoelectronic devices.3.Measurements of photoconductivity and minority-carrier lifetime of photonic materials.4.Lab on Michelson interferometer5.Lab Experiment on diffraction 6.Lab on polarization7.Lab on spectrometer

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。一、幾何光學   1.光學基本定律(3) 2.球面光學系統成像(3) 3.雷射光傳播特性(3) 4.光纖(6) 5.輻射度學與光度學(3)二、物理光學   1.光的電磁理論(3) 2.光波的疊加與分析(3) 3.光的干涉與干涉儀(6) 4.光學鍍膜(3) 5.光的繞射(6) 6.光的偏振(3) 7.晶體光學基礎(6)
description.en: A、Geometrical optics 1.Basic optical laws 2.Paraxial systems 3.Laser beams 4.Optical fiber 5.PhotometryB、Physical optics 1.EM waves of light 2.Superposition of light waves 3.Interference and interferometer 4.Optical coating and thin film 5.Diffraction 6.Polarization 7.Light in crystal

description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。 本課程介紹各種光學方法用以量測位移及角度之變化量，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號以便進行分析，其內容含：1.簡介 2.光學尺 3.干涉儀 4.幾何誤差 5.幾何光學尺 6.雷射光學尺 7.雙頻干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target. Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves：1.Introduction 2.Geometrical error 3.Laser encoder 4.Interferometers 5.Optical encoder 6.Optical

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。  由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

name.zh: 製造科技特論及實驗(一)
name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Manufacturing Technology(

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實驗，由製科所教授共同開課。第一學期探討的範圍主要在製造技術，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。.
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In first semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing technology, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一, 廣用於刀具, 模具, 光學元件, 感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹, 相關配備, 原理與能量提供方式, 將包括: 沉積技術與應用, 化學氣相沉積法, 物理氣相沉積法, 電鍍技術, 真空工程, 直流電源, 射頻電源, 微波, 熱燈絲等各種能量介紹, 以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically.  This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new films coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior film qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the students or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意瞭解原子結構乃是起碼的科技素養，本課程主要的目的是建立學生將來可以以X光作為研究工具的能力。本課程主要可分成四部份：一是結晶學原理、二是X光繞射的原理、三是X光繞射的基本應用、四是材料的結構分析。除此之外，並將進行一小部份實驗以驗證學理，同學可從實驗中學習檢驗製程中材料所發生問題，從而解決製造的問題。
description.en: Topics covered include properties of X-rays, geometry of crystals, directions of diffracted Beams, intensity of diffracted beams, orientation and quality of single crystals, structure of polycrystalline aggregates, determinations of crystal structure, phase diagram determination, and Experiments.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意一維系統的自由及強制振動多維系統的自由及強制振動自然頻率的計算與模態分析振動的控制振動量測與應用振動系統之數值分析方法非線性振動機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
description.en: Free and Forced vibrations of Single Degree of Freedom Systems, Free and Forced vibrations of Multi-degree of Freedom Systems,  Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes, Vibration Control, Vibration Measurement and Applications, Numerical Methods in Vibration Analysis, Non-liner Vibration, Vibration Analysis of Mechanisms and Power Transmission Elements.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 科學理論、計畫理論、傳播理論、美學等創新設計實務相關之理論，以培養獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考能力，並實際演練應用於設計實務，以建立專案研發設計之理論基礎。
description.en: This course provides theory of design related topics on Science Theory, Plan Theory, Communication Theory, Esthetics etc. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and simulation verification.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 本課程旨在(一)探討中西傳統家具造型起源及演化；(二)研究影響各時期家具風格形成的因素，包括社會文化環境、使用材料、結構方法、裝飾手法及其象徵意義等；(三)探尋傳統設計元素在現代家具上的可能應用。
description.en: An in-depth exposure to the origins of form and the evolution of furniture design both in Oriental and Western World; Comprehensive analysis of the characteristics, including specific cultural environment, material used, construction methods, ornamentation, and Symbolism in decoration which define a period style; Study the application of traditional design elements on contemporary furniture.

name.zh: 室內空間與家具設計研究
name.en: Study into Interior Space and Furniture Design

description.zh: 講授人、家具、環境之介面，進而探討室內空間機能、生活機能與家具之關係性。以家具為室內空間中之機能元素之一，探討家具設計之創新思維。
description.en: A general study of interface among man, furniture and environment that related to space function, living function and the use of furniture. Design philosophy of furniture, which is considered as a functional element in interior space, is to be deliberating in the study.

description.zh: 工業設計在產品開發上，係一多元素、多因素組合的系統性與整合性工作，其在企業內執行的成敗，關鍵在於：(1)企業組織體系是否能有效應用工業設計的功能，(2)設計部門是否能有效管理控制本身的設計品質，(3)設計行政事務工作(包括人事資料、材料及日程進度等)是否能有效率的管理與執行。因此本課程旨在研究探討設計專業上的高階之管理知識與技能，課程內容包含(1) 設計功能的管理、(2) 設計品質的管理、與(3) 設計行政的管理，課程並輔以實例專案研討驗證。
description.en: Industrial design is an integral activities with in product development. It's effect in organization depends on; 	1.The understanding and the applying of industrial design from    	  the TOP management organization.2.The management of design quality with in the design function. 	3.The efficiency and the effectiveness of design administration.Therefore, the content of this Special will including the theory and practice of 1.The management of design function.2.The management of design quality.3.The management of design administration.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 本課程探討物件導向程式設計的原理, 語言與環境, 基本設計方法,  並以課程專題製作的方式使學者熟稔物件導向觀念. 課程內容: 物件與類別, 訊息傳遞, 繼承, 組合, 虛擬方法與多型性, 模板, 物件導向語言與環境, 專題
description.en: This course investigates the principles, languages and environments, and elementary design methods for object-oriented programming.  Students will be required to complete a term programming project. Course contents: Class and object, message passing, inheritance, composition, virtual methods and polymorphism, templates,  object-oriented languages and environments, term project.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解        1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Basic Design Paradigms 3.1 Divide and conquer 3.2 Greedy methods 3.3 Dynamic programming 3.4 Probabilistic algorithms 4. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5.分散式同作控制   6.電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1. Process synchronization 2. Concurrency Mechanisms 3. Virtual memory 4. Distributed Systems 5. Distributed Concurrency Control 6. Queuing Models

description.zh: 這個課程介紹人工智慧相關的觀念與技術。基本的觀念部分，課程的前半段將涵蓋基本的人工智慧觀念，包括標的化簡，各可能解檢視，問題解決策略，以及邏輯與理論證明等。課程的後半段，在探討如何使電腦能具備跟人一樣的常識。這個部分的內容，將涵蓋語言的處理與瞭解以及學習模型。課程中，將施以小型的個人程式作業，藉以驗證所教授之觀念與技術。對如何運用人工智慧來使電腦變的更具智慧，更容易且方便使用等課題，將在課程後段以討論方式進行。課程大綱：人工智慧簡介 ──  什麼是智慧 / 電腦能夠多聰明；敘述比對及標的簡化；各可能解檢視 -- 找出可行之所有方式、找出最佳方式、對解答窒礙條件之處理；問題解決策略 -- 解答產生與驗證、規則取向系統 ── 合成，分析與思維模型等應用；邏輯與理論證明 -- 規則推演、決議證明法、操作序列計畫、限制令傳遞驗證法；語言處理 -- 語法處理、腳本式框格處理、解讀簡單問題及命令；電腦學習 -- 推演參考原則、推演程序；討論。
description.en: This is to introduce the essential concepts and techniques in the field of artificial intelligence (AI).  Basic concepts will be covered in the first half of the course to establish the solid foundation.  The topics include goal deduction, alternatives exploration, problem-solving paradigms, and logic and theorem proving.  The second half of the course concentrates on making computer to know commonsense things, including language understanding and learning.  Various small program projects will be assigned and implemented by individual to exercise and evaluate each learned technique.  Discussion on adapting AI techniques in different domains will be conducted to explore approaches to make intelligent computer possible. Outline: Introduction - What is intelligence / How intelligent can computers be; Description Matching and Goal Reduction; Exploring Alternatives -- Finding Paths, Finding the Best Path, Dealing with Adversaries; Problem-Solving Paradigms -- Generate and Test,  Rule-base

description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Communication Networks 2.Layered Structure 3.Routing and Switching Techniques 4.Flow and Congestion Control 5.Medium Access Control Mechanism  6. Local Area Networks 7. Network Interconnection 8. Wireless Networks 9. High Speed Networks

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統（Geographic Information System, 簡稱GIS）之開發應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案﹔配合完整之中文介面與印表技術，更可提供高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資料處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification..  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to G.I.S. for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, analysis, and display capability along with G.I.S..

description.zh: 地下水對人類而言扮演相當重要的角色（特別在飲用水方面），但隨著工商的發達，其來自人為或自然的威脅卻與日遽增，本課程除可讓學生瞭解地下水水及水力等基本原理外，亦著重污染等傳輸行為之解析，以為規劃及管理地下水資源之依據。
description.en: In as mush as ground water provides drinking water to so many people, the quality of ground water is very important. Ground water may be contaminated from natural sources or he acts of humans. The ground water hydraulic and transport are discussed. Then the ground water contamination can be controlled.

name.zh: 環境政策與國際環保事務

description.zh: 環境保護近年來備受全球重視，國際環保公約如保護地球臭氧層的蒙特婁議定書及保護瀕臨絕種野生物種的華盛頓公約，都備有貿易條款，對不遵守規範國家，得施以相關貿易制裁；世界貿易組織（WTO）中設置貿易與環保委員會，以協調貿易與環保間之問題與紛爭。因此本課程之目的在於加強學生對我國環境問題、政策及環保國際公約之深入了解，以作為進一步培養對環境規劃及管理之能力。
description.en: The environmental treaties such as Montreal protocol or Basel Convention require all the parties in the world to take appropriate measures to protect human health and the environment against adverse effects.  Therefore, the purpose of this class is to provide the comprehensive information on those international treaties and the resulting efforts and policies in Taiwan

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.en: The Software of Mechanical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）Matlab  and  toolkit 之使用
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid  design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Application of  Matlab and toolkit

name.en: The Software of Electrical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助電路設計自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）spice與pspice電腦輔助電路設計軟體之介紹及應用  （4）電路佈局自動化設計軟體之介紹及應用  （5）期末專題
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid circuit design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Introduction and application for computer-aid circuit design software(spice & pspice). 4. Introduction and application for design automatic software of circuit layout. 5. Final project.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。

Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

description.zh: 1.動態系統之機械負載：加速度、摩擦、位移及外力負載  2. 動態系統之模型化處理 3. 動態模擬與分析 4. 電腦輔助動態模擬 5. 結論
description.en: 1. System dynamic mechanical loading effects, including inertia, friction, displacement and forcing effects. 2. Dynamic system modeling 3. Dynamic analyses and simulations. 4. CAD-simulations  5. Conclusions.

description.zh: 電子商務課程包含下列課題：(1)網路經濟 (2)電子化企業 (3)企業策略 (4)電子商務的網路基礎建設 (5)供應鍊管理 (6)企業間商務 (7)電子化行銷等。電子商務在擴展傳統企業經營的管道，提供以客戶為中心的解決知道。電子商務也將連結客戶關係、知識管理與企業智慧以便提供更好的服務
description.en: The course of E-Commerce provides our students the following topics：(1) webonomics (2) electronic-business(e-B) (3)business strategy (4)e-commerce infrastructure (5) supply chain management (6)business-to-business (B2B) commerce (7)e-marketing etc. E-commerce extends the reach of traditional business operation systems to provide customer-centric solution. It also links customer relationship, knowledge management, and business intelligence to provide another channel of running business.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生了解灰色系統的理論及原理，進而培養學生能運用該灰色系統之理論於資訊系統，控制系統，影像處理，模糊控制，類神經網路，醫學，工業，經濟及管理等領域之應用：課程內容包含：1.灰色系統介紹  2.灰色關聯度分析  3.灰色預測原理  4.灰色建模 5.灰色決策      6.灰色控制        7.專題計劃
description.en: The principle and theory of grey system is  interoduced.  Therefore, the student can apply the grey system to information system, control system,image processing, fuzzy control, neural network, medicine, industry, economy, and management,etc..  The contents of this course is : 1. The introduction of grey system. 2.Grey relational analysis. 3.The theory of grey prediction. 4. The grey modeling. 5. Grey decision 6. Grey control. 7. Final project.

description.zh: 同步工程課程提供學生兩方面學習的主題：(1)建構同步產品與製程的方法與組織 (2)應用前法設計與發展出全生命產品整合系統。整個課程將涵蓋下列子題：(1)製造競爭力(2)全生命週期管理(3)在造工程(4)同步工作團隊(5)系統工程(6)資訊塑模(7)產品實現流程剖析等多項子
description.en: The course of Concurrent Engineering provides two major themes. The first theme is establishing a concurrent product and process methodology. The second theme is applying this methodology to design and develop the total product integrated system. In the following key topics are discussed in the whole semester: (1) manufacturing Competitiveness (2) life-cycle management (3) process reengineering (4) Concurrent work-groups (5) system engineering (6) information modeling (7) product realization process.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。齒輪應用的歷史、定義、分類及特殊輪齒、齒輪作用理論、齒輪之製作方法、齒輪損壞及負荷能力估算、齒輪潤滑、檢測等。
description.en: History of Gear Development, Definition, Classify, and Special Gear Profile, Principle of Gear Action, Gear Manufacture, Failure Type, Load Capacity Estimation, Gear Lubrication.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.
