description.zh: 簡介，感測器，基本驅動器，順序及計時控制，PLC，伺服驅動器及放大器，基本伺服控制系統。
description.en: Course Title:Mechatronics PracticeDescription:To familiarize students with the usage of mechatronictechniques and corresponding parts/components

description.zh: 簡介，二極體電路，雙極性電晶體電路，低頻小信號放大器，場效電晶體電路，功率放大器，回授放大器，差動放大器，多級放大器，運算放大器，頻率響應分析與設計，振盪器及濾波器分析與設計，固態半導體理論。
description.en: Course Title:Linear ElectronicsDescription:This course is to study the characteristics of thesemiconductor devices and design of the electronic circuits.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 水為寶貴之資源，具有各種有益用途，但必須符合用水之標準，而使用之後又變為污水或廢水，在排放之前必須予以處理，以免造成污染並符合環保放流標準之要求，本課即在介紹給水之淨化以及廢水之處理，以應當前之需要，其內容則將包括水質概述，用水標準，淨水工程，污水處理，汙水特性，水體自淨，物理、化學及生物處理方法，污泥處理，回收利用等學理與實務並重，使學者對水及廢水處理問題有一基本瞭解，進而可應用於特殊用水及廢水處理。
description.en: water is valuable and benefitial resource for human.The topics of this course include the knowledge and okills of general introduction of water quality, water cleaning engineering, wastewater treatment, wastewater characteristics, water self-cleaning, physical, chemical and biochemical process, sludge treatment and recycle.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子製造程序（其中最主要者為積體電路之製造程序）。首先說明製造方法上之三個 主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。
description.en: An introduction to the semiconductor manufacturing process. Courses include diffusion, microlithography and deposition.

description.zh: 單元操作專論是化工單元操作更深入之專題討論之課程,其(一)內容著重於流體之特性及其應用,高壓或真空之形成,粉粒及超微粒之作業,機械分離(包括滲膜分離),熱輸送及其應用,高溫爐與耐火材料等。
description.en: Special topics on unit operation are an advance course designed for chemical engineering unit operations. It (1) consist of characteristics of fluid and its application, high pressure and vacuum formation, power and super fine powder processing, mechanical separation process(include membrane separation), heat transfer and its application, furnaces and refraction.

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 由環境保護的觀點來了解化學工業及其他產業之污染源，並且教授資源回收、減廢技術、進而設計清潔生產製程，以達到廢棄物資源化與管理的最終目
description.en: This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and other industries. And the course will cover the techniques for waste recycle and reduction. Furthermore, the final goal is to design a cleaner technology process for achieving the waste minimization and waste management.

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程內容著重於品質管理、程序管理、安全管理及有關管理之未來趨勢和法令之介紹。進而提高工廠之生產力及品質保證，減低成本、精減人事。
description.en: The course introduces the regulations and concepts of the quality, process and safety management.

description.zh: 以科學方法探討聚合物特性，使學生了解分子結構與物性的關係、物性之測定方法及物性與加工應用上之關係。
description.en: The unique features of polymers are introduced.  Specialemphasis is given to the structuring effects of processingon polymer morphology and properties.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子製造程序（其中最主要者為積體電路之製造程序）。首先說明製造方法上之三個 主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。
description.en: An introduction to the semiconductor manufacturing process. Courses include diffusion, microlithography and deposition.

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件、燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
配合粉末冶金課程，安排包括粉末製造、粉末處理、粉末特性、粉末混合、成形與燒結等實習項目。讓學生能在理論講述之外，也有實際操作之經驗。
專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
本課程主要在以壹個學期的時間，將電化冶金所牽涉到的領域，將實務與理論配合，而其中包括三大領域：1.電化學實驗。2.電鍍及無電電鍍之研討。3.腐蝕反應的測定及控制操作。以期使學生由實驗過程當中，充分了解到電化學之應用範圍及成果。
寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，表面處理的 工業安全與衛生以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface treatment is an essential process at all kinds of manufacturing process, eitherin traditonal industry or in modern high-tech industry, surface treatment is alwaysplaying an very important role. The course mainly discusses the theory basis, methodand application of surface treatment technique, in order to cultivate interest andprofessional knowledge for students. The course contents include the fundamentaltheory of surface treatment, pre-treatment technique, all kinds of surface treatmentmethods and their related knowledge, the industrial safety and sanitation of surfacetreatment, and the application of surface treatment techniques.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 本課程為講授鋼鐵製造原理與技術。內容分兩單元，一為生鐵之製煉，另一為鋼之製煉。生鐵之製煉講述鐵礦石之還原反應及高爐操作之熱力學原理及其應用，以及高爐操作之技術發展。並介紹直接製鐵及溶融還原法之概要。鋼之製煉講述煉鋼之治金熱力學原理，並說明頂吹式純氧氣轉爐，底吹式純氧氣轉爐，頂底吹轉爐，電爐及平爐煉鋼法之冶煉技術。
description.en: The course is to lecture the principle and technique of making ferrous products, itscontent is divided into two parts, one is the refining of pig iron, the other is therefining of steel. The former one is to describe the reduction reaction of ferrousmine, and the thermal dynamics principle and application of a blast furnace, thetechnique development of a blast furnace operation as well. The latter one is todescribe the metallurgical thermal dynamics principle of steel making, and to describe the smelting techniquesof the converter with pure oxgen infusing from upper part or bottom, electric furnace, open hearth.

description.zh: 探討有關無機物質的化學性質、原子結構及化學反應。討論在材料及礦物上之應用。
description.en: Chemical properties, atomic structure and chemical reactions of inorganic chemicals will be discussed.  Their applications to material science and minerals will be 	discussed too.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 本課程在討論陶瓷性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹                                          儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗                                          、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔                                          內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、                                          沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology , sampling and physical method, application of                                          instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ                                          permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear                                          test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 一、合成方法--固相、溶液、氣相反應法二、成核與晶體成長機構與速率三、單晶合成-矽晶、石英及鑽石四、粉末合成-鈦酸鋇系、氧化鐵系、氧化鋯、氧化鋁、氧化鋅之合成五、薄膜技術簡介
description.en: 一、Method - solid liquid and vapor state reaction二、Mechanism and rate of neucleation and crystal growth三、Single crystal- silicon silica and diamond四、Powders- Barium titanite Ferrites Zirconia Alumina Zinc oxide五、Introduction to thin film techniques

description.zh: 在淨污水場中有各單原之廢污泥,每一單元所產生之污泥有不同之性質.為避免造成二次公害,有必要對其家以處裡之.本可程之內容:屋泥來源,種類及特性,淨水場屋泥處理,污泥場污泥之處理,並介紹物理,化學,生物之各種污泥處理方法
description.en: There are many kinds of waste sludge in water and wastewater treatment plant the sludge form each unit has different propertion.It must be treated for not having the second pollution. The kinds of sludge , the sources of sludgethe specific of sludgethe treatment of sludge from water and wastewater treatment plan,and physical,chemical,biological treatment methods of sludge in this topic

description.zh: 本課程講授空氣污染的成因，影響及防制方法，課程內容主要為污染源、大氣擴散，各種污染物反向控制，污染物包括粒狀物、一氧化硫、二氧化碳、碳氫化物、氫氧化物、光化學煙霧、臭味等。控制方法講述及簡要之理論及應用於控制設備之設計方法。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the student with current and novel techniques for controlling common air pollutants. Topics include Physical, chemical, and biological behavioral properties of dusts, droplets, and gases in the atmosphere. The sampling and analysis of air pollutant. Planning and operating air pollution surveys.

description.zh: 使學習者瞭解土壤與岩石之性質對隧道設計、開挖之相互關係。課程內容包括隧道工程介紹、隧道之荷重及應力分佈、地質調查、支撐及襯砌設計、各類隧道施工之方法及計測儀器之說明。
本課程主要目的在提供學生瞭解影響住宅計劃與建設的不同層面及地方政府落實住宅計劃與建設可能涉及的資源課題與對策。因此本課程內容主要包括(1)住宅發展概論，(2)研擬發展計劃的住宅因素，(3)住宅建設與營建產業，(4)住宅財政與支出，(5)住宅規劃與管理。
description.en: For the purposes to provide an understanding of the variety of perspectives which influence housing planning and construction, and to consider the resource issues and strategies involved in the implementation of housing planning and construction at the local level, the course consists of (1) introduction: historical perspectives on housing development, (2) the housing component of development planning, (3) house building and the construction industry, housing development process (4) housing finance and expenditure, (5) housing management.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對中國傳統文化所孕育的建築表現，使學生認識傳統的文化涵構與建築之關係及其構造方法，其主要授課內容如下：1.思想及文化背景：以周易及禮制為起點，以至儒道二家思想，引申至象徵主義或文字學等對建築之影響。2.類型討論：探討住宅、宮殿、寺廟、衙門、城、橋、塔、墳等設計思想與原則。3.建築主題：瞭解建築平面發展之原理、立面設計與台觀處理之原則及象徵主義思想對平面規劃、布局及立面裝修之影響。4.園林建築：以江南園林及北方大型園林為例，探討其布局、園屋、疊山、理水等相關規劃原則。5.建築構造：瞭解土木構造的基本設計原則與構造方法，進而討論裝修彩畫等細部特徵。
description.en: It is an introductory course to history of Chinese architecture. The purpose is to raising students' awareness of traditional culture for further concern of our environment. It will focus on the following themes:(1) Thought and Culture. (2) Architectural type. (3) Architectural characters. (4) Garden architecture. (5) Structure and Construction.

description.zh: 一、	從廣域範圍介紹自然生態與人文資源永續發展之道二、	藉由我國現階段環境發展策略及個案經驗，實務討論生態環境課題與措施。三、	課程內容涵蓋台灣自然與生態環境現況、森林、山坡地、農地、能源、海洋、自然保育、人文環境保育、環境法規、環境影響評估。
description.en: 1.	It will introduce the sustainable development of natural ecology and human resources through wide range.2.	It will emphasize with students to discuss the issues and strategies on environmental ecology. Those discussions will depend on national environmental development policies and special cases in recent years.3.	This course will include Taiwan nature and ecology, forest, lands lope , farmland, coastal area, natural conservation , human resources ,environmental impact assessment.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 介紹真空技術基本概念、各種真空泵原理、真空元件用材料特性、各種真空元件及其材料特性、真空壓力量測技術、真空計工作原理、真空系統設計、真空測漏技術及真空系統之各種應用，使用和維修。
description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

description.zh: 本課程著重食品冷凍之原理、設備、儲存及應用技術，使學生深入了解食品冷凍之精髓。課程涵蓋︰（1） 食品儲存方式與設備。（2） 食品微生物理論（3） 各種食品之冷凍方式與原理（4） 工業食品冷凍系統（5） 食品冷凍運輸之方法和技術（6） 超低溫食品冷凍技術
description.en: This course is concentrated in the fundamentals facility storage and application technology of food refrigeration.  The students should be familiar with the principles of food refrigeration after these lectures.     The topics of this course are:(1) Food storage and equipment.(2) Food microbiology and refrigeration.(3) Refrigerating technology of various food products.(4) Industrial food freezing systems.(5) Distribution technology of chilled and frozen food.(6) Cryogenics in food refrigeration.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 研讀戲劇作品，注重作品所反映的人文與社會環境的互動。上課方式以評析和討論為主，以加強口語表達能力及文學賞析能力，並以戲劇演練提升語言學習效果。
description.en: This course is intended to acquaint students with western plays which focus on the interaction between culture and society.  In addition to developing students' speaking ability through discussion, particular attention is given to the appreciation of literature.  Students are encouraged to perform some of the plays to enhance their proficiency in language and their interest in literature.

description.zh: 本課程在研討課程設計之理論與應用。
description.en: This course is designed to develop theory and applications in English curriculum.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
description.en: Type Synthesis and Number Synthesis of Mechanisms. Creative Mechanism Synthesis.  Dimensional Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators.  Optimal Design. Introduction of Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms.

description.zh: 建議先修課程：流體力學、水文學、統計學資料研析方法、水文統計與迴歸分析、小流域洪水推估(含基本水文系統實驗)、基本水文系統實驗、頻率分析(2)、水文演算、水力演算、降雨逕流模擬、地理資訊系統(GIS)結合地文單位歷線(GIUH)、序率水文模式，HEC-2,6 講解與實習、專題討論
description.en: Prerequisite(suggested) : Fluid mechanics, Hydrology, StatisticsIntroduction, Data error analyses, Hydrological statistics, Frequency analyses, Stochastic analyses, Hydrological routing, Hydraulic routing, GIUH plus GIS, Small watershed flood prediction(including Lab. experiment), Seminar.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 1. 環境保護推論2. 空氣污染概論,法規及處理技術3. 水污染概論, 法規及處理技術
description.en: This lecture includes:1.introduction to environmental conservation 2.laws and treatment techniques of air pollution 3.laws and treatment techniques of water pollution.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。

We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語學習時間達２５時數（新日本語之基礎第５課）的學習者所設。授課使用視聽教材、注重會話及聽力訓練。期使學習者能在各種日常場面的會話練習中、習得正確的日語會話表現。達到會說、會用的教學目標。予定課桯學習目標：形容詞的肯定、否定、存在句、所在句、喜惡句、希望句等句型。
description.en: This is a step-up lesson for Japanese language study; total studying time will be 25 hours. The curriculum will use linguistic teaching equipment, we would emphasize on drilling of conversation practice and listen comprehension practice. We hope our students can learn proper Japanese conversation through a series of daily life conversation practice and finally achieve the purpose of speaking and using Japanese freely. Estimated learning targets: existence sentence, location sentence, comparison sentence, likes and dislikes sentence, expectation sentence etc.------basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 在上學期開設，一學期，兩學分。斷限：始於日據時期，止於七十年代，以台灣白話文學之生發演進史程為主軸。範圍：涵蓋文字改革運動，第一次鄉土文學論戰，第二次鄉土文學論戰，  本土化文學思想研析、及作品選讀。要求：學期報告一份、期末考。
description.en: Period: From the Japanese sovereighty to the 1980's; emphasizing the history of the vernacular literature. Topics: The movement of the language revolution; the first controversy of folk literature; the second controversy of folk literature; analysis of the literary localization movement and the study of selected works.Requirements: One term paper and a final exam.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生明瞭中國及西洋人生哲學的歷史發展，並介紹人生哲學的內在涵義，分別探究人的意義、特性、人性論、真善美聖等問題；兼及人生哲學的當代意義：包括各種人生觀、生命的尊嚴、愛與婚姻及修養等探究。使知、情、意能融為一體，藉以確立個人理性的生命追尋目標。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to enable students to realize historical development in Chinese and Western philosophy of life by introducing the inner connotation of philosophy of life and studying the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life, humanism, virtue, good and beauty, etc..  Furthermore, this course introduces the meanings of philosophy of life in relation to the contemporary life, such as various kinds of philosophy of life, dignity of life, love and marriage, moral cultivation. It aims to integrate knowledge, passion and intention, for setting up the goal that personal rational life should pursue.

description.zh: 就人類的歷史來看，生活中某一種活動形式，反復行之，久而成俗；如屬良風美俗，則用禮的形式加以規範，成為禮俗。我國古有冠、昏、喪、祭四禮，從人之始生，教養成人，成家立室，以至慎終追遠，對每個生命中的重要歷程，都訂定一套禮儀制度，展現對生命特有的關懷與尊重。本課程即欲透過這些禮制，探討內涵的精神意義，一則瞭解中國文化重倫理，重理性，重人道的特性，一則秉持古禮的精神，因應社會變遷，建立合乎現代人生活的生命禮俗，從而體悟生命的莊嚴與神聖。
description.en: As is viewed from the human history, a certain active form in life--once repeated constantly--eventually turns into a conventional norm. The forms, if classified as fine or elaborate, are regulated in the format of rituals and then become well-accepted ritual. There used to be four customs in the ancient China: manhood, marriage, funeral, and worship. For each individual stage of a life, beginning from the birth of a man, through the years of growing up and building a family until the ending point of it, a complete system of rituals are constituted to reveal due concern and respect to life as it is. By studying and discussion of these rituals, this course explores the spiritual significance hidden behind, trying to help further understand the Chinese civilization which pays more emphasis on ethics, logic and humanities on the one hand, and on the other hand, to build up new rituals in accordance with the modern society and people and to help people realize the significance of life.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹中國各類藝術的來龍去脈，基本知識和理論，使學生對中國各類藝術有初步瞭解，具備欣賞能力，並能滌淨心靈。課程內容包括:1.建築部分：涵蓋宮殿、寺廟、陵墓、民居等不同建築類型，以及中國著名之庭園介紹。2.器物部分：講述中國玉器、金銀器、陶瓷器、琺瑯器、漆器、象牙、竹木器等。3.介紹自新石器時代以後之雕塑、佛像、明器等，欣賞其形式美、材質美與其表現涵意。4.解說中國繪畫史，各朝代重要畫家，就山水、花鳥、人物、畜獸等，分析其構圖，用筆用墨，使用皴法等。
description.en: The course is to equip students with the ability to understand and appreciate Chinese Art. Contents: 1.Architecture: including the architecture of palace, temple, emperor's mausoleum, residence, as well as famous gardens in China. 2.Wares: such as jade objects of China, gold and silver ware, ceramics and porcelain, cement ware, lacquer ware, ivory,bamboo, etc. 3.Sculpture: introducing clay statute of Buddha, ware, and appreciating the beauty and expression of art. 4.Painting: introducing the history of Chinese painting, master painters, and various painting; analyzing the making of a sketch of a painting, stroking, and inking, of landscape, flower-bird works, figure painting, and animal painting.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹西洋各類藝術的來龍去脈，基本知識和理論，解說各時代之繪畫風格，重要畫家，以及著名建築、雕刻、手工藝等，以幻燈教學，使學生瞭解西洋藝術，具備欣賞能力，並能滌淨心靈。課程內容包括: 1.史前藝術：包括洞窟藝術、骨雕石雕等。2.上古藝術：如西亞、埃及、希臘、羅馬、波斯、印度等線畫、雕刻、建築。3.中世紀藝術：拜占廷、東羅馬藝術。4.文藝復興：包涵繪畫、雕刻建築、壁畫等。5.十七、八世紀：巴洛克、洛可可時代。6.近代繪畫：如新古典主義、浪漫派、印象派等。7.現代藝術：野獸派、立體派、超現實主義、象徵主義、抽象派、達達派、普普、歐普、新寫實、未來派、構成派等畫派之繪畫。
description.en: The contents of this course are constructed as following :1.Prehistoric Art : including"The Art of Engraving ", "Carving designs on bone ","Carving designs on stone "..etc. 2.Previous Ancient Art: For instance, the painting engraving architecture of Siya, Egypt, Greece, Rome, Persia, India.etc 3.Art of Middle Ages: Art of Byzantine, Art of Rome. 4.Renaissance: including Painting, Engraving, architecture, fresco etc. 5.Seventeenth and Eighteenth Centuries: Periods of Baroque. Rococo. 6.Modern Painting: for instance, Neoclassicism. Romanticism. Impressionism etc. 7.Contemporary Art: The painting of fauve, Cubism, Surrealism, symbolism, Abstract Art, Dada, Pop Art, Op Art, Neorealism, Futurism, Formalism…etc. The interpretation will include styles of different period, important artists, famous architectures, engraving handicrafts and so on. The Slides will be used as a teaching assistance to help students understand Western Art.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 深入一層探討素描，增加複雜，及難度。修過素描（一）或有基礎之同學，均可修此課程。使用四開紙，靜物之種類增加，例如水果、蔬菜、酒瓶、襯布所構成之畫面，要能加以構圖，而後表現各類物品之質感，以及玻璃之透明感。亦包括人物速寫、交通工具，以及較複雜之建築物寫生。要求作畫速度與準確度相互配合，每幅作品兩週完成。
description.en: Study sketching further in order to increase its complexity and sophistication.  This class is limited to students who have taken the Sketch (I) course.Quarto papaer shall be used to paint various still life, for example, fruits, vegetables, wine bottles and composition of a picture on canvas.  It is important to conceive the picture first and then express the quality of each object and the transparency of glass.  It also includes the sketch of figure painting, transportation and complex architecture. The coordination of painting speed and precision is important, as each painting shall be completed within two weeks.

description.zh: 素描是一切繪畫基礎，設計產品，有美的意念，還要有能力將之畫出來，才算完成，否則即成空泛理論。(一)鉛筆練習：線條方向、明暗度變化、立體概念、光影效果等。(二)方形器物練習：以平移法正確掌握立方體造形，並將明暗效果表現出來。(三)圓柱體練習：畫易開罐飲料罐，能繪出其質感效果和細部文字、圖樣。(四)圓形物練習：能把握造形、質感、量感、光澤，以水果為練習對象，如蘋果、橘子等。(五)多種形體練習：如松果、貝殼、落葉等，均能把握其造形、質感、光影特色。由完全沒有概念開始，訓練至有寫生能力，也學得耐心、細心和觀察力。
description.en: Sketch is the base of painting. The product design and concept of beauty must be expressed; otherwise, it will become only a talk.Contents:1.Pencil practicing: lining, chiaroscuro, cubism, lighting, etc.2.Square ware practicing: controlling the cubism styling with a horizontal movement, also, expressing chiaroscuro, etc.3.Cylinder practicing: drawing beverage can with the sense of its quality, detail, and picture.4.Round object practicing: styling, quality, quantity, luster; also, drawing fruit, such as, apple, orange, etc.5.Multiple-shape practicing: such as, pin cines, shell, falling leaves with the sense of styling, quality, lighting, etc.The course is to train students who have are inexperienced to sketch with the ability of patient, detailing, and observation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞與飲茶活動有關的文學名作，從而瞭解茶歷史與茶文化，認識歷代著名的茶人與茶事。並由欣賞茶以及相關的文物，體會飲茶的藝術與趣味。茶源自我國，然後逐漸成為世界性的飲料。因為飲茶活動富涵藝術與趣味的特質，茶也逐漸成為重要的社交媒介。在我國，茶結合了道家與禪學的思想，其實，茶不僅只是一種美味的飲料，茶道的理念更值得我們悉心探索，藉以浸潤生活的內涵。
description.en: This course aims at first making students acquainted with literature concerning tea by which a better understanding of tea personalities and anecdotes will be obtained and secondly, cultivating students' appreciation of a great variety of tea and cultural artifacts linking with tea by which interests in tea art will be kindled. Having been a luscious beverage brewed for some 3,000 years of Chinese history, tea now has a deep and far-reaching impact on the world. Since making tea illustrates the character of art and affords the delight of life, tea therefore build a bridge among all walks of life. Making tea, combined with Taoist School and Buddhist Meditation, at its uiumate attainment, is both an enjoyment and an artistic summation. The search for tea is a dual process of understanding tea's flavor as well as the thought with it.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en: This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

name.en: Selected readings of Erleen Chang's Novels

description.zh: 夏志清教授「中國現代小說史」於張愛玲曾有如下之評：「張愛玲該是中國最優秀、最重要的作家。僅以短篇小說而論，她的成就堪與英美現代女文豪如曼殊菲兒、安泡特等人相比，有些地方她恐怕還要高明一籌。」夏氏之說容或不乏不以為然者，張氏以細膩之心、冷漠之筆，細剖人性陰暗面，所營造出之特殊迷人風貌，則是不爭的事實。本課程以討論方式（選課者須課前細讀指定作品）細部探究作者謀篇佈局之匠心，人物刻劃之功力，除勾勒大家創作之技巧，以為攻錯之石，更期培養與課者閱讀時品察與思辯之能力。
description.en: Erleen Chang, according to the eminent professor of Chinese Modern Novel, C. T.Shia's remarks,"was the most outstanding and influential writer in the history of Chinese Literature. Her accomplishment in short novels could match with that of the American literary giants,Katherine Mansfield and Anna Porter;she even outstripped them in some ways." Although Prof. Shia's favorable comments on Erleen Chang did not produce a unanimousAgreement; however, indubitably, Ms. Chang really excelled in using her exquisite perception and imperturbable depiction to penetrate the darkSide of human beings,which naturally created an enchanting style. In This class, students' participant discussions are required with a view to making a detailed exploration of Erleen Chang's remarkable skills are expectably developed and improved by way of adequate discussions, andTheir comprehension and appreciation of literary works will by further fostered.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 人類為了獲致美好的生活，在物質生活上不斷地努力於自然科學與工藝技術的創造與改進，但在精神的滿足上，雖尚不致於愈來愈貧乏，但如果我們從生活的整體來看，人們似乎並未能真正有效解決他們自己所製造出來的問題。社會科學的研究，即是希望能提供人們對社會及行為科學領域的認識，減少對未來的失望、恐懼；增加對生活的瞭解、憧憬。本課程雖然未能顧及社會及行為的全體，但卻可以讓學習者在最短的時間，掌握到入門的主要課題。
description.en: In order to acquire a better material life, human beings have been working hard on the innovative production and improvement in natural science and technological skills. On the other hand, though people do not suffer from a worse mental satisfaction than before, they have not discovered a way to effectively solve the problems made by themselves, as is viewed from the entire picture of life. The study of social science presents such a good way that the average people would know more about both social and behavioral science, help reduce the fear of future disappointment and, what is important, add to the knowledge and beautiful image of life. This course, though not able to cover all the topics of social and behavioral science, attempts to help students have a good command of major topics in the shortest period of time.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養有效率的工業人才。包括生產、分配、消費財貨與勞務的各部門，無論是新進的員工或最高層的經理，如要請求效率，則定須具備本門知識。本課程分四方面：（一）、人事心理，包括工作分析，人事選用程序及方法，人事測驗原理及應用，工作考核，員工訓練，工作評價；（二）、組織社會心理，包括動機理論與管理，態度與士氣的測量，組織理論與人行為，領導行為，員工參與，意見溝通；（三）、工程心理，包括工作環境與工作效率，機械設備與工作設計，意外防止與工業安全；（四）、消費心理，包括消費行為，廣告宣傳。上課方式包含講授，討論個人習作等。
description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. In class, lecture,

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 「時間學」是一門相當實際的課程，其目的在教導學瞭解時間的意義，提升時間使用的價值以善用時間，充實自己的生命與生活。本課程內容提供時間理論相關的觀念與方法，希望同學於課程中，一方面從學中做，一方面從做中學，而達到「時間學」增進個人健康，促進人際關係，有效處理公私事宜的三大功能。
description.en: "Time Science" is a very practical course and its purpose is to teach students the meaning of time with a view to increasing the value of time utility so as to make good use of time and enrich one's own life and living.The contents of the course provide the concept and method relating to time ethic and hope students to learn and work so  that "Time Sciecne" may attain three major functions--increase personal physical and mental health, promote interpersonal relationship and effectively handle public/private affairs.

description.zh: 「時間學」是一門相當實際的課程，其目的在教導學瞭解時間的意義，提升時間使用的價值以善用時間，充實自己的生命與生活。本課程內容提供時間理論相關的觀念與方法，希望同學於課程中，一方面從學中做，一方面從做中學，而達到「時間學」增進個人健康，促進人際關係，有效處理公私事宜的三大功能。

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

name.en: The Social and Cutural Characters in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是涵括台灣社會與台灣文化兩大部份，台灣社會部份可分為早期台灣原住民社會，十七世紀以後漢人社會的建立，十九世紀從移民社會到定居社會，近代工商業社會的建立等幾部份；文化方面則以原住民文化，漢人文化及近代文化為教授重點，希望在一學期的課程中使學生對台灣的社會與文化有一概括性的了解。
description.en: This course primarily includes two major sections: Taiwan's society and Taiwan's culture.  Taiwan's society is made up of early aboriginal society, Han immigrant society after 17th century, the society of settlement in 19th century and the establishment of industrial/commercial society after 1930.  Taiwan's culture focuses on aboriginal culture, Han culture, and contemporary culture.  This one-semester course provides students with the basic knowledge about the Taiwan's society and culture in the hope that the students would have a comprehensive understanding of the culture and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

name.en: Changes and Development in the Taiwan Economy

description.zh: 一個社會的經濟發展造成社會結構的改變，整個社會的政治參與程度也隨之提高。台灣經齋發展提供了政治民主化和價值多元化觀念孕育的環境。這個舉世公認的經濟成就是如何締造的？本課程將以學術理論深入分析她的發展策略，解析這數十年來經濟變遷與發展的過程，以及所呈現的目題癥結與特徵，並尋求它的解決之道與未來發展的正確方向。
description.en: The economic development of a society tends to result in the transformation of its social structure and an increase in the political participation of its people. The economic development of the Taiwan economy has provided an environment contributing to political democratization and multi-valued concepts. How has this well-recognized economic development been established ? This course aims at exploring development strategies in depth, based on theories , analyzing the process of transformation and development of the Taiwan economy in the past several decades. Examining problems caused by this transformation the developing process and their characteristics , and seeking potential solutions and right directions for the future Taiwan economic development will also be examined.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.

description.zh: 『誰掌握了資訊，誰就獲得先機』。二十世紀人類進入資訊時代，資料型態愈趨多元，各類資訊排山倒海而來，人們不再擔心資訊不足，反倒擔憂『資訊氾濫』，多的不得了。在如此多的資訊中，如何去作最有效的選擇與利用，將是知識份子必備的技能。課程內容包括：科學簡介(定義、特興、方法、發展)、科技指標與各類型資料之介紹與利用。
description.en: "Whoever holds the information takes advantage." With an approach to the information age of the 21st century, people are faced with various types of information, which rushes to us like a flood. People are not worried about being lack of information; instead, they are more worried about a "deluge of information." Encountered with so much information, each of the individual intellectuals finds it essential to know how to pick and make use of -with efficiency--the information in need. This type of ability has become a fundamental skill for modern people. The topics covered in this course include: Introduction to Science (Definition, Properties, Approaches and Development), Technological Indexes, and a diverse types of information.

description.zh: 本課程是邏輯學的開始，上課內容含三大部分：通俗邏輯、形式邏輯與數理邏輯。課程中安排了很多與歷史、文學、日常生活及科學有關且有趣的例子，希望同學會喜歡本課程且有能力分析他人的觀點。
description.en: As an introduction of Logic, this curriculum covers three principal divisions: informal logic, formal logic and the logical structure of science. In this course, we illustrate with many interesting examples from the history, literature, living stories and sciences. Hope you enjoy this class and have an ability to analyze the standpoint of others.

description.zh: (一)認識地球與地球科學  1.認識地球的重要性--經驗的與科學的角度2.地球科學家與地球知識3.地球知識的探究範圍--地球的結構(二)地球與星系的有機係4.宇宙的形成與大爆炸5.地球與銀河系6.地球的動力系統--內動力與外動力(三)岩石圈與人類棲居的範圍7.地球的內動力系統與地殼變動8.岩石圈的形成與特徵:從地質到地形9.岩石圈、陸地與人類活動的關係(四)水圈、大氣圈與自然環境皂動力10.水、空氣與土地的互動11.水循環與外動力系統(陽光)12.大氣運動與天氣變化(五)認識地球的本質13.地球作為人類的家14.節制與維護:人與自煞的和諧交往。
description.en: 1.Knowing the Earth and the science of Earth(1)The importance of knowing earth--its experiential and scientific role(2)Scientists of Earth and the knowlege of earth.(3)The  structure of earth.2.The organic relation between earth and galaxy (4)The formation of universe and Big-Bang.(5)The earth and Milky Way Galaxy.(6)The dynamic system of the earth.3.The lithosphere and the horizen of human habitat(7)The inner dynamic system of the earth and the crust change.(8)The formation and characteristic of the lithosphere:from geology to geomorphology.(9)The relation of the lithosphere,continental plate, and human activities.4.The hydrosphere,the atmosphere and the dynamic of the physical environment.(10)The interaction between water, air and land.(11)The hydrologic cycle and the outer dynamic system.(12)The air movement and the weather change.5.Knowing the nature of earth.(13)The earth as a living place for mankind.(14)Restriction and maintance: the harmonious relations between men and nature.

description.zh: 探究永恆的奧秘，追尋自然的真相，是寶石學中最令人癡狂的學習動力。當您望著各類寶石，欣賞它們顏色與光彩的同時，是否也能從另一個角度，去看看大自然千萬年的蘊化奇蹟，與結合多少後天資源使璞石發亮的過程？寶石領域一如大千世界，不但充滿了驚嘆，也佈滿了色彩。在課程內容上，將藉由豐富的教材，帶您上山下海，探訪寶石的故鄉，從伊麗莎白泰勒的鑽石，賈桂琳甘迺迪的珍珠項鍊、紅藍寶、祖母綠....或關之琳所買下的翡翠、日本皇太子妃的珍珠項鍊、慈禧太后的西瓜碧璽...等等，課程由淺入深循序漸進，不但能帶給您更豐富的珠寶常識，同時也能實際地藉實物練習，到兼具理論與實務的學習樂趣。
description.en: To probe the mystery of eternity, to searach for the answer of nature, is the charismatic power of learning inside gemology circles.  When you look at the variety of gemstones, do you appreciate their color and luster?  Furthermore, do you also see beyond the beauty and discover the miracle of a gem's thousand-year life?  To see how the multi-complicated processes combine to take a raw stone from the earth and turn it intoa beautiful finished gemstone?A gem itself is like the no-bounds world, not only full of fascination but also full of colors.  We are going to, by means of plentiful materials, bring each of you into the spectacular mining districts.  From Elizabeth Taylor's "TAYLOR-BURTON" diamond, Catherine Kennedy's jewelry box-pearls, rubies, emeralds...l to Empress Dowager Tzu-Hsi's Watermelon Tourmaline... etc, we will lead you step by step into this fasciating world of gems, and you will also be given practical lessons to probe theories in order to achieve great success in st

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 數學與物理是學習理工科目必備的工具，然而很多同學卻視為畏途。探究其原因，是抽象的思維方式以及部分不合實用的作法，造成學習上的障礙。本課程希望藉由電腦的輔助，將數學、物理與工程數學上幾個重要的觀念具體化，使學生能對抽象觀念有直覺式的體驗，結合理論與實際，進一步提升分析問題的能力。
description.en: Mathematics and Physics are prerequisites for learning science and engineering; nevertheless, many students are afraid to study them. Investigating into the problem, we find that the way of abstract and some impractical methods hinder them from learning those subjects. In this course we will study some major concepts including Mathematics, Physics and Engineering Mathematics etc. and combine the theorems and the realities by the aid of computers to promote our students the capability of analyzing.

description.zh: 了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en: The course is concerned with the design and production of jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is delivered through a programme of lectures and practical design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques ofproduction , and its processes and equipments. Based on the foundation of design skills, the students can practice the techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh: 充分了解各種家具與陳列品或配置品之材料的特性及其應用方法、技術以及在室內設計中之重要性。同時亦探討室內設計有關之建材種類、特性、防火安全性及其應用之方法，使室內設計之表現能達到居住生活上舒適與合理的效果。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with nature of furnishing and materials frequently used in furnishing. The application of various materials will be discussed including attribute categories, physical properties, flameproof standard and finishing process.

description.zh: 以傳授設計原理、平面及立體設計觀念、美的形式原理、平面及立體的構成練習、對各種材料特性的應用經驗以及造形與色彩的研究達到設計感覺的養成並提高計畫性創造能力，是發展實用性及機能性以前之設計訓練的基礎。
description.en: This course aims to develop the ability of students to meet specific sensory needs through the creation of abstract visual order in the form of two-dimension and three-dimension. The visual organization of design elements including line, plane, volume, and the analysis of their abstract relationships and principles of order are studied.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 梁任公說：「孔子這個人有多少價值，連帶的論語也有多少價值。」所以論語是瞭解孔子最好的一部古經典。本課程旨在透過論語誘使學者對孔子的精神面貌有一番真切的體認，並使學者由而知曉儒家何以能深深影響著二千多年來國人的思想言行。
description.en: As Qishau Liang states, "Lueng Yu is as valuable as Confucius." Therefore, Lung Yu is the best classics, which provide easy access to deepening the understanding of Confucius. The course aim at sharpening students' knowledge about Confucius and Confucian school that has exerted profound influence on Chinese for over two thousand years.

description.zh: 語言是人類情感相互溝通的橋樑，促進人際關係的和諧，而如何把自己的想法、看法、非常輕鬆而正確的說出來，卻不是一件簡單的事。要想說的中肯、說得技巧，就必須經過一番學習與研究。這就牽涉到：與意學、語言學以及倫理學、理則學與表演術，讓別人聽了樂於接納。因此必須注意說話的內容、音調和儀態三方面的基本訓練，更更要注意時間、空間、對象，而有所不同。還要傾聽別人說話的美德。總之，會說不是胡說、亂說、愛說與白說，也就是能放能收、恰到好處。
description.en: Being the bridge of human communication,language improves personal relationship. But how to express oneself comfortably is not that simple. It needs practice and skill if one wants to speak to the point. This 「practice」involves semantics、linguistics、ethics、logic and performance. Therefore, the content、tone and deportment are all essential  elements to a successful speech. When to speak、where to speak and to whom to speak are various components of one's talk. To listen is more important than to speak.

description.zh: 素描是造型能力訓練，水彩則為色彩的美感訓練。本課程先以幻燈教學方式，欣賞中外名家的水彩作品，再作實際水彩畫練習。首先教調色法，接著指導靜物、樹木、建築物等畫法，以其達到能具備室內靜物畫，及室外風景寫生的能力。
description.en: Sketch trains mold-making ability, and watercolor trains esthetic sense Ability of colors. First,this course lead you to enjoy famous watercolor painting by slide and then you practice actually painting. When you start to paint,the teacher let you know to paint different things, such as still life,trees or buildings. So that you can have ability of painting stillLife and of sketching outside scenery.

description.zh: 小說是文學中重要的一支，而短篇小說更是利用最經濟的文學手段以塑造人物形象，反映社會現實的一種藝術。我國的短篇小說，自唐至清，代有佳作，故本課程即以歷代傑出作品為範疇，選擇最具代表性的篇章，透過閱讀及討論之方式，對其做多層面之探討，以期使受教者能在宏觀方面瞭解其所反映之當代文化及歷史價值，在微觀方面則能欣賞其所體現的文學藝術，最終並能掌握課堂所學，觸類旁通，施用於其他相關領域之學習。
description.en: Fiction is one of the important genres of literature. The novelette is regarded as the most effective means to depict people and reflect the society. From Tan Dynastic to Chiang Dynastic, Chinese classical novelette abounded with great works of fiction. This course aims to introduce some representative works of Chinese classical novelettes. By reading and discussing works of novelettes, we can understand their social background and their value in history in macro view and enjoy their beauty of literature forms in micro view. Students can apply what they learned in this course to their specific field of study.

description.zh: 有健康的父母才有健康的子女，在青少年問題趨向嚴重的時代，此觀念漸受世人重視，但為人父母雖有心善盡職責有時卻不知從何做起，本課程在透過教導學生未來成家育兒時先瞭解父母影響子女行為的因素，建立親子正向關係的要素，子女不適應行為的特徵，稱職父母的內涵以及吉諾特、戈登、崔克斯，行為學派、溝通分析、現實治療、家族治療等親職教育的模式內容來學習親職之道進而從事教育工作者將可把觀念教給下一代，並進而瞭解不適應行為學生的家庭因素，從事進一步的輔導與教育。
description.en: The idea "where there are good parents, there are good children" is the main concern for people in this age when juvenile problems are getting serious. It's true that most parents intend to be good ones, but most time they don't know how to do. The object of this course is to teach students what they should know before they become parents. They will study which factors influence children education, how to analyze children's characteristics, and learn the parental education pattern of H.Ginotte, T. Gordon, R. Dreikurs, behaviorism, reality therapy, transactional analysis and family therapy. Students will find that they can easily learn the ways of being good parents from the concepts given in this course. As to the teachers, in addition to teaching knowledge to their students, they can research and find the family causes of their maladjusted students, and make the further guiding and educating.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

description.zh: 台灣經濟的發展已帶動了政治民主化的發展，尤其自解嚴後，政治社會全面變遷，改變幅度之大與範圍之廣，變化之快速與轉變之激烈，予人一種眼花撩亂，目不暇給之感。身為明日舞台的主人，要不被社會拖著走，唯有洞察、掌握社會變遷脈動的能力。本課程將以學術理論為你深入分析、客觀探討。
description.en: The economic development in Taiwan resulted in the rapid development in political spheres. Especially after the lifting of the martial law, the changes in politics and society have exerted a great impact.  This course will provide students with the ability to keep track of the changes of the society.  Based on political theories, students will learn how to investigate the phenomena and analyze the reasons of these changes.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

name.en: Medical Trend in the New Era

description.zh: 本課程目標：旨在讓學生認識未來醫療走向，掌握趨勢，同時由醫療之觀點，對學生之健康觀作心的新詮釋，並且讓學生實際地學習實用的救命術，重新探討新生命之價值。本課程內容涵蓋：1.新醫療關係與諮詢、2.如何與醫師對話、3.高關注照護醫療倫理、4.掌握生命力、5.新人類通病、6.領袖特質發展之醫療觀、7.善用醫療資源網路、8.未來基因新療法、9.由健保財務危機看新發展潮流、10.急症新趨勢與預防、11.如何自我建診、12.親子醫療新方向、13.健康全方位人格發展新趨勢-4Q學習、14.生命奇蹟-心肺復甦術理論與演練、15.醫療市場與策略之新趨勢。本課程授課方式：口頭講授、課堂討論、專題演講、情境實習演練。
description.en: This course aims to acquaint students with the new trend of medical treatment. From a medical perspective, students will be furnished with new ideas about health.  With practical training and application, students will have a better understanding of life values.The contents of this course include: (1) New perspective on medical relations and consultation (2) How to talk to doctors  (3) Medical Ethics on intensive care (4) The mastering of your life-force (5) The common failing of the new generation (6) A medical observation on leadership qualities (7) How to make use of the internet resources (9) Financial crisis caused by health insurance and the future development (10) The new idea about emergency cases and their prevention (11) Self-exam on health (12) New medical theory on parent-child treatment (13) 4Q-multi-dimensional development of personality (14) Miracles-the theory and practice of CPR (15) New trend on the medical market and strategy.Teaching method: Lecture, discussion, spe

description.zh: 小本課程目標：旨在讓學生認識未來醫療走向，掌握趨勢，同時由醫療之觀點，對學生之健康觀作心的新詮釋，並且讓學生實際地學習實用的救命術，重新探討新生命之價值。本課程內容涵蓋：1.人類胚胎幹細胞、2.老化、3.癌症、4.細胞死亡、5.遺傳疾病、6.基因轉殖與剔除、7.人類基因體計劃、8.基因治療、9.複製人、10.基因改造食物、11.生物晶片、12.免疫與疫苗、13.人造器官、14.蛋白質結構生物學與生技製藥、15.未來展望。本課程授課方式：口頭講授、課堂討論、專題演講。
description.en: This course aims that the completion of human genome project will build up the prosperity of biotechnology industry. Enormous progress and propounding impacts from biotechnology will influence our future life. This class will focus on the latest developments of biology and interpret the tendency of biotechnology.The contents of this course include: 1.human embryonic stem cell、2.aging、3.Cancer、4.programmed cell death、5.Genetic diseases、6.Transgene and gene knock out、7.Heman genome project、8.Gene therapy、9.Heman cloning、10.Genetic modified food、11.Biochips、12.Immune System and Vaccine、13.Bioartificial organ、14.Structural Biology and Pharmaceutics、15.Future Prospect.Teaching method: Lecture, discussion.

description.zh: 中國的古玉除了被儒家視為君子的象徵外，在禮制上有崇高的地位。通過玉器的形制、紋飾和功能的研究，有助於明瞭三代的原始宗教和儀式生活，以及東周以來的巫術信仰。所以，玉器雖是具體的器物藝術，卻也是構成精神信息的主要載體，它豐富而神秘地反映了古代中國形上的精神文化。本課程擬結合文物考古與文化美學的視角，以歷代相關文獻、文學作品為素材，輔以近來出土的玉器圖片，對古人用玉觀念，用玉行為作一重點呈現。一則次第凸顯「玉」於古代中國歷經法器、禮器、服飾器各階段的人文內涵以及其為中國文化之一核心單元的本質；一則期使學習者嘗試由「物相」本身來體察古人心靈的趨向，從而體悟美的「器物」是人類的創作，也是對永恆、無限的憧憬與捕捉。課程內容包括五部分：(一)、從「物理境」轉入「心理場」論述(二)、史前～兩漢墓葬玉用法介述(三)、春秋戰國以還「玉」之德化(四)、唐宋以還「玉」之俗化(五)、古典文學中的玉石意象 (六)、古玉之品賞及其他
description.en: Chinese jade has long been regarded by Confucianists as the symbol of gentlemen, enjoying a highly respected status. Through the study on the shape, the incised decoration and the function of the jade, we can understand the primitive religion and the ritual life in the Three Dynasties, as well as the witchcrafts practiced since Eastern Chou. As an art form, the jade is a concrete object, but in effect it embodies the spiritual life of people, enriching and reflecting the metaphysical aspects of culture, which serves as a starting point for exploring aesthetic concepts. This course aims to integrate authropological and cultural aesthetic perspectives. With the assistance of the recently unearthed jade, the emphasis is put on ancient people's idea of jade and their usage of it. It is hoped to guide students to conceptualize the spiritual life of ancient people and further realize that objects are the things which motivate our creativity, inspire our imagination.

name.zh: 中國文學中的女性敘寫

description.zh: 本課程探討女性在中國文學中的處境與面貌，選擇歷代敘寫女性上有代表性的篇章，包括詩歌、辭賦、傳奇、明清小說等等，透過文本的閱讀，觀察古典中國男性精英的主流敘寫，並且透過近代女性主義相關的論述，以及分組報告的活動，使學生深化認識現代女性作者的性別意識，進而啟發其思考兩性平權教育的內涵。
description.en: This course is meant to explore a diversity of roles and aspects of women in Chinese literature. Typical works of writing-including poems, verses, legends and novels in Ming and Chin dynasties--in different periods of time are selected for reading and further discussion. Through the reading and analysis of the articles, we observe the main-stream descriptive statements made by male elite writers and, by using the relent theories of today's feminism, we encourage the students to further understand the gender awareness of modern feminists and the deeper interpretation of equal-right education through group reports.

(2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. description.zh: 電子商務的應用與發展已對企業經營與生活方式造成相當大的衝擊，在網路發展先驅與先行導入區域已逐漸將網路應用納入企業日常運作以及居家生活中的一部份。這些應用無論我們從媒體(media)功能、通路(channel)功能來區分，或是從對象來分為B2B、B2C、C2C以及企業內部之應用，其企業經營的方式與傳統模式有許多的不同，因而也衍生許多有趣、重要課題。
description.en: Introduction to Electronic Commerce (E-commerce)- information evolution- information network, telecommunication and business - information society (4C)‥ Discussion of business to business operations (Extranet)‥ Discussion of business to consumer services (Internet) and internet marketing ‥ Discussion of organization management and control (Intranet)‥ Discussion of e-commerce systems and technology support

name.en: The Introduction of Enterprise Resource Planning

description.zh: 本課程包含：企業資源規劃概論及其各模組之介紹。模組包含生產管理、財務管理、人力資源管理及專案管理。除外，並介紹目前常用之商用軟體系統及上機實習。
description.en: This course includes：the fundament of ERP and its component modules. The modules will cover production management, financial management, human resource management, and project management. Besides, the introduction of some commercial software systems and laboratory practice will also include.

description.zh: 空間指人類生活空間，包含室內與室外。合理的空間規劃將提昇生活品質、與工作品質，本課程旨在研究探討空間規劃的原理與實際應用情形，研究如何在有限的空間做最具人性化、合理化的設計。
description.en: A general study of function of space that affects quality of life and work. The elements that construct space are to be studied to form a general understanding of their physical and psychological influences to people who live in.

description.en: This course is a special topics of Techniques of Synthesis Ceramics.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topic includes: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Network2.Layered Structure3.Routing and Switching 4.Flow and Congestion Control5.Medium Access Control 6.Local Area Network Protocols and Standards7.Network Interconnection8.Performance Analysis

description.zh: 精密電子陶瓷與現代生活密不可分, 其乃應用陶瓷材料之特性在電子電路中產生之特定功能, 故精密電子陶瓷亦可稱為功能電子陶瓷(functional ceramics); 同時可對某些物理量如壓 ,力,音, 濕度, 溫度, 氣體等產生響應, 故其亦可稱為感測陶瓷(sensing ceramics). 精密電子陶瓷課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: Recently, the applications of fine electronic ceramics are widely used in our real life. It may also be called as "functional ceramics" because of the special function applied in practical circuits; through the responses caused by pressure, force, sound, moisture, temperature and different gas, the fine electronic ceramics may also be called "sensing ceramics". In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications.

description.zh: 本課程將給予學習者充分瞭解現代体電路設計技術如何產生矽晶片與應用在各種複雜電子系統上.課程內容如下所述:1.系統設計流程2.MOS電晶体理論3.IC制程技術4.電路效能評估5.CMOS電路與邏輯設計6.副系統設計7.期末專題計劃
description.en: The course dims to give an understanding of how integrated circuit technology is used today to implement complex electronic systems as silicon chips.Content in the course are:1.System Design Flow 2.MOS Transistor Theory3.Fnbrcation Process Technology4.Performance Estimation 5.CMOS circuit and Logic Designs6.Subsystem Design 7.Final Project

description.zh: 1.機率理論基礎 2.隨機變數之產生 3.隨機過程基礎 4.Markovian 排隊系統分析5.Semi-Markovian 排隊系統分析 6.開放及封閉型排隊網路分析 7.隨機存取/網路系統之效能分析 8.系統輸入模式之建立 9.交換網路之模型建立與分析

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的教育哲學架構，課程包 括三大部份，第一部份探討哲學的基本課題與哲學和教育的關係；第 二部份探討傳統和當代教育哲學所面對的基本問題，以及它們對教育 實務所能提供的回應之道；第三部份涉及發展個人教育哲學之重要，方法與推行時可能受到的挑戰。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The goal of this course is to offer a conceptual frame of educational philosophy. The course is divided into three sections. Part I deals with basic issuers in philosophy and the relationship between philosophy and education. Part II is a survey of how traditional and modern philosophies have faced the basic philosophic issuers, and the alternatives they have developed for educational practice. Part III discusses the need for developing personal philosophy of education, some ways of building such a philosophy, and some of the challenges involved in implementing that philosophy.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在提供有志從事教育工作的學生有關教育心理學的系統知識使其在未來從事教職時，具最有效的方法瞭解，敘述，預測及其學生的行為並從而採用最佳的教學方式，以達成教育目標。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the systematic knowledge of educational psychology to the students who have the willingness to be teachers. It presents the students with the basic psychology theories of instructional process; mental-physical development; the principles of learning and instruction; the learning about motor and skill, words and concepts; cultivating of thinking and creative; motivation and interest in instructing process; the measurement of individual difference; proper instructions against differently mental students; teacher-student relationship and students behaviors; instruction evaluation; mental hygiene and health in school. After finishing this course, the persons will get the most effective methods to understand, describe or predict their students behaviors, and can choose the best instructional ways achieve the educational goal, when they become teachers in the future.
