description.en: This course offers a introduction to students about the idea of general education and gives students some motivation about learning how to teach.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生學完了這門課以後在實際研究中能夠正確地選擇，運用統計方法。因此，本課程側重每一種統計方法的適用條件及不同方法之間的區別與聯繫。對於公式的推導及具體計算未作為重點來闡述。本課程在介紹平均數、標準差及相關系數等統計量的基本計算公式的同時，對於它們在次數分配表中的計算以及一些簡便算法、經驗公式也適當加以介紹，目的在於幫助學生更好地理解這些統計量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students know how to use properly static method to solve real problem. Students will learn the suitable condition for every different problem, mean, standard deviation, and basic calculation . Formula and complication calculation will not be the emphasis part.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使學生了解學校行政的實質內容，其包括了教務、訓導、總務、人事及公共關係等五項工作；就其實施歷程來看，含蓋了計畫、組織、溝通、領導及評鑑等五個步驟。學校行政人員既要對教務、訓導、總務、人事及公關，有深入的研究；對計畫、組織、溝通、領導與評鑑，也要加以探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students understand the system of school administration. The contents include (a) study affair (b) admonish (c) general affair (d) personnel affair (e) public relationship. The real procedures include (a) planning (b) organization (c) communication (d) leadership (e) evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使有志從事教育工作的學生了解如何對某一種行業做系統的分析。此分析包括：1.進入此行業的準備工作 2.從事此行業須要具有何種能力才可勝任 3.從事此項工作的人在工作上須要負那些責任 4.從事此項工作的人平日的工作項目為何。本課程將針對如何分析以上四個大項做深入的探討。
description.en: The goal of this course is to make students understand how to use professional analysis to one special occupation. This procedure includes (a) the preparation for this occupation (b) the ability for this occupation (c) the responsibility for this job (d) the ordinary job for this occupation.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下:(一)充實學生各種激發快樂學習、健康成長的學識，以培養適任的優良教師；（二）提供學生班級教學及班級導師工作的實務經驗與做法，使具備有效處理教學與班級事務的良好技能﹔(三)奠定學生熱忱積極經營班級之理念，養成學生教育專業精神，使其在從事教育工作時能發揮愛心與熱忱來欣賞及參與班級的各種活動。 本課程的內容涵蓋班級經營的學理基礎;班級經營的目標、計劃與評鑑;教學、行政之經營;導師的任務與素養;學生自治活動、教學情境佈置;班級氣氛與學習;班級的評量設計;有關安置、生活、學習、行為等方面的問題與對策等 本課程利用講授法、小組討論法、發表法等方式進行教學，盡量在教學過程中探討教室內各種發生的狀況尋求最佳解決方式，且進行發展積極、和諧、快樂的師生互動模式之探討以利學生在未來擔任教師時能駕輕就熟於班級經營工作，而達成本課程之目標 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(備註：本資料係由本校各教學單位、教務處課務組、進修部教務組、進修學院教務組及計網中心所共同提供！本資料僅供參考，正式資料仍以教務處、進修部、進修學院所公佈之書面資料為準。
本課程的目標在使未來即將擔任教職的學生能夠利用多媒體電腦做為教學上的輔助工具。課程的重點主要在介紹 MS Office PowerPoint 應用程式在教學上的應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students know the computer software will do a lot of help in the future teaching. MS Office PowerPoint will be the main software introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在提供有志從事教育工作的學生有關職業訓練與輔導的系統知識，使其在未來從事教職時，能提供學生適當適時就業資訊與諮詢服務，並且讓學生對外在世界的工作環境有更進一步的了解。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide a series of knowledge about occupation training and counseling. Students will get the information before jump into the job, and receive more information about outside world before leaving school.

description.zh: 「輔導工作是所有教育工作者的責任」。任何人都會遭遇問題，成長中的學生尤其有各式各樣的問題。身為人師，在教學過程中應輔導學生解決問題，以培養健康進取，有能力解決問題，適應環境的學生為己任。在本課程的目標即在透過對青春期挫折徵候的了瞭以及學者心理分析輔導法、個體心理輔導法、存在主義輔導法、理情輔導法、認知輔導法、溝通分析輔導法、行為輔導法等輔導理論，並配合實例分析使未來之教育工作人員獲得工作時的輔導知能以及培養輔導工作的志趣。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: When teaching, the teachers should keep in mind the duty to guide their students to overcome the frustration or to solve the difficult problems as to nurture the students to be healthy, positive, with their own abilities to overcome difficulties and to be apt to their environment. The object of this subject is to help the students with the willingness to be teachers get the knowledge and abilities of guidance on their teaching in the future, and develop their willingness and interests of guidance. This course presents the students with the units including to understand the symptom of adolescent frustration, the method of person-center approach, the method of rational-emotive therapy, the method of cognitive guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance, the method of behavior guidance. In addition, this course also introduces many practical cases so that the students can more effectively study the relative theories.

description.zh: 技職教育相關法令、大學法、師資培育法、教師法、教育人員任用條例等主要法令；教育人員法律素質、公文基本概念、習作與處理。
description.en: Foundation of ceducational low, current educational policy and the procedusre of official document.

description.zh: 學生探討主題可包含當前技職教育重要課題，並挑選有興趣之子題提出心得報告。
description.en: Exploration of major research regarding contemporary trends, issues and programs in technical-vocational education. Students expected to select contemporary issues of technical-vocational education into their current researchinterests. Discussion, case study and reporting are required.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 由對物體寫生的實作過程中，訓練學生對物的觀察能力，並培養對美的感知能力以及充份習得對形體的簡潔速寫技巧、圖示性設計圖之表達能力。
description.en: This course introduces a visual approach to thinking, leaning and communicating for design students. Drawing is a tool to help students solve promblems, create new ideas and assist communication. Through practicing drawing methods, tools and techniques, students learn how to draw more proficiently.

description.zh: 包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術。
description.en: Training students to operate some basical equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh: 1.電場強度電通密度、磁場強度、磁通密度電荷與電流之介紹;2.材料之導電特性，介電特性與導磁特性之介紹;3.向量數學分析之複習;4.馬克斯威爾方程式與羅倫磁力;5.靜電場之介紹;6.靜電問題之解決;7.靜磁場之介紹;8.靜磁問題之解決。
description.en: To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes :1.Electromafnetic Model.2.The Vector Analysis.3.Static Electric Fields.4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions.5.Steady Eletric Currents.6. Steat Mafnetic Fields.7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

description.zh: 使用partakar  code ，Ansys ， Mold  flow ， C  Mold ， Phoneic  等其中軟體，來計算一維穩態，一維暫態，二維穩態，二維暫態，之熱傳導問題，邊界層之偶合性流場問題，燃燒場之數值計算，電子熱傳相關系統。
description.en: By using software of Partankar Code, Ansys, Mold flow, C mold, and Phoneics parckage to compute the one dimension steady, are dimension unsteady, two dimension steady , two dimension unsteady heat conduction problems, boundary layer compling flow's problems,combustion calculations, electronic heat transfer problems.

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程之設計，以介紹資料庫之概念與技術為主。其課程重點為關聯式資料庫的相關概念與技術。所有的學生將分組執行一個以網際網路為基礎環境的實務計畫。課程大綱：簡介 -- 資料庫系統概念；資料組織-- 表注檔案、索引檔案、範圍式搜尋資料結構；關聯性模型--關聯性幾何、關聯性演算；查詢語言及其最佳化處理；關聯式資料庫設計理論--功能相依性、正規化處理；網際網路資料庫計畫--計畫設計提案、資料庫構建、CGI 程式規劃、DBI/ODBC/JDBC 資料庫連結；進階主題--物件導向資料庫、多媒體資料庫、分散式資料庫、資料庫之平行操作相關問題
description.en: This course is designed to introduce concepts and skills essential in the database systems.  Relational database will be the main focus with related topics including, relational model, design theory, and query optimization.  Students need to work on a group project aiming a real application on INTERNET.  Outline : Introduction  -- Database System Concept; Data Organization -- Hashed Files, Indexed Files, Data Structure for Range Queries; The Relational Model-- Relational Algebra, Relational Calculus; Query Language and Optimization; Design Theory for Relational Database -- Functional Dependencies, Normal Forms; Database Project on Internet -- Project Design/Proposal, Database Construction, CGI Programming, DBI/ODBC/JDBC Database Connection; Advanced Topics --Object-Oriendted DB (OODB), Multimedia DB, Concurrent Operations on DB, Distributed DB.

description.zh: 1.簡介，2.數位影像處理的基礎，3.影像的轉換，4.影像的增強， 5.影像的復原，6.影像的壓縮，7.影像分割，8.影像的表達及描述，9. 自動車導航，及醫學影像的處理和應用，10.論文討論。
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Principles of digital image processing3.Image transformation 4.Image enhancement5.Image reconstruction6.Image compreession 7.Image partition 8.Image description9.Applications 10.Papers study

description.zh: 模糊集合之觀念與數學原理，數學運算，近似推理理論，解模糊方法之設計，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之數學模式，理論分析及其應用。
description.en: Mathematical principle,  peration for fuzzy control theory, Design, mathematical model, theoretical Analysis and application for FUZZY controlller.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: The course mainly lecture the materials and products which are made by powdermetallurgy techniques, including high melting material, super hard material, superheat resistant material, sintered electricjoint material, sintered mechanical parts, sintered friction material, sintered magnetic material, etc., it is expected students wholearn the powder metallurgy course may have further understanding to theapplication of powder metallurgy techniques.

description.zh: 數位通訊系統簡介，數位調變及偵測，數據譯碼及錯誤更正碼，同步(載波及時刻訊號的還原)，多工技術，通訊網路技術。
description.en: introduction to design communication systems, digitalmodulation and detection, data signaling and error correction codes, synchronization,multiplexing techniques,communiation networks.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 環境規與管理是一門跨學科極為重要的整合性課程，討論內容包括：(1)環境問題與社會、(2)環境經濟學、(3)環境政策、(4)環境規劃原理與方法、(5)環境質量管理、(6)環境保護規劃技術、(7)環境影響評估、(8)土地利用與國土規劃、(9)區域性環境管理、(10)都市環境之管理、(11)環境保護管理制度、(12)自然資源與景觀維護以及永續發展之環境管理等。
description.en: Environmental Planning and Management aims to study the relationship between environmental problems and social, economics and ecology. The theory and technology of planning are also described. The environmental impact assessment is a major method for the approching of balance between economical development and environmental protection, therefore it is stressed to state it's contents and assessment methods. Further the National planning and City planning in the area of environmental espects are also described in the course. It intends to let the students realize how to have a sustainable development under the policy of environmental protection.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹河川污染控制中有關河川污染源的種類及數量，就其分析模式中有關溶氧之來源、溶氧之消耗、非感潮河川與氧垂曲線模式之推演、河川調查及資料分析工作及河川涵容能力之計算方法亦有完整之敘說，藉由河川涵容能力之推估，達到控制或分配家庭污水及工業廢水之目的。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the River Pollution Control.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

name.en: Applications of Computer Software for Engineering

description.zh: 土木工程涵蓋範圍廣泛，本課程主要著重於工程軟體之應用，務使學生熟悉1.結構設計各步驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法.2.教授學生自行準備輸入程式資料,並操件以求取結果.3.根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。

本課程為大學部地盤改良之一後續課程,進一步介紹比較重要和特殊的地盤改良工法之原理及其在土工和基礎施工方面之實際應用.此外,亦介紹與大地工程施工之安全與穩定具有密切關係的地錨工法和加勁土(補強土)工法.因此本課程包括下列各種工法之原理,設計及施工: 1.石灰穩定工法  2.水泥穩定工法  3.化學灌漿處理工法  4.凍結穩定工法  5.粉體噴射攪拌工法  6.碎石排水工法  7.地錨工法  8.加勁土(補強土)工法  9.地盤改良(穩定)工法之選擇.
description.en: This course introduces the principles and practical applications of the current and special method of soil Improvement in geotechnical engineering.In addition,as an important stability technique of soil slopes and soil grounds,reinforced earth method and ground anchor method are also introduced.Therefore,this course deals with the principle and practical application of following subjects;1.lime stabilization2.cement stabilization3.stabilization by grouting4.stabilization by freezing5.Dry Jet Mixing method 6.reinforced earth method 7.ground anchor method.

description.zh: 由於經濟活動的急遽擴張，大量生產、大量消費的生活型態，產生大量廢棄物，導致環境負擔超過涵容及復原能力，加上台灣地狹人稠，自然資源不豐，造成環境品質惡化及發展遲滯危機，因此，如何突破天然資源限制，開創永續發展動能，以建設舒適美好生活環境，實為當前重要課題。本課程分別從污染防治、生化程序控制、材料製程應用及災害防治等工程技術觀點著手，培養具永續發展之經營管理智能。
description.en: Because of fast economic development of the modern society, our environment has been deteriorated due to the massive waste production from these economic activities.  Therefore, how to recover and provide the best environment from engineering point of view is a very critical issue.  This course will provide specific knowledge base to these advanced students from pollution control, chemical process, disaster prevention and material engineering points of view in order to minimize waste production before, during and after the production process.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。本課程包括黑體輻射、量子力學概念、原子能階、半導體、接合面，光之調制、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊。
description.en: Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering is one of fundamental electro-optics courses. It consists Blackbody Radiation, Quantum Mechanical Concepts, Energy Bands, Semiconductors, Junctions, Modulation of Light, Display Devices, Lasers, Photo-detectors, Fiber Optical Wave-guide and Optical Communication.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。其內容包含: (1) 電磁簡介; (2) 向量分析; (3) 靜電場; (4) 靜電問題的求解; (5) 穩態電流; (6) 靜磁場; (7) 時變場與Maxwell方程式.
description.en: Electromagnetics is one of the fundamental courses in electro-optics program. The following contents are included: (1) introductions; (2) vector analysis; (3) static electric field; (4) solutions of electrostatic problems; (5) steady electric currents; (6) static magnetic fields; (7) time-varying fields and Maxwell's equations.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程進階課程之一。其內容包含: (1) 光纖通訊系統的簡介; (2)光纖的結構和光傳播的特性; (3)光源和傳輸器; (4) 光檢測器和接收器; (5) 光纖系統的設計和效能.
description.en: Fiber-optic communication is one of the advanced courses in electro-optics program. The following contents are included: (1) introductions; (2) optical fibers; (3) optical sources and transmitters; (4) optical detectors and receivers; (5) system design and performance.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。從黑體輻射之頻譜分析開始，引入量子化的概念；進而推出物質與波動之二象性。經由波爾之半古典的氫原子模型，結合量子化的概念以解釋原子結構，並引入薛丁格方程式所求得之波函數與電子之空間機率的關係。再由原子進而推廣至分子及固態物理之能帶理論，應用能帶理論於解釋固態晶體之光、電及熱學等特性，並介紹半導體之應用的基本原理。
description.en: Modern Physics is one of fundamental electro-optics program courses. From the analysis of the spectrum of black-body radiation, the concept of quantization is introduced and the duality of matter and wave is also introduced. Combining the idea of quantization and the semi-classical hydrogen model of Bohr, the structure of atom is described. Solving the Schrodinger equation, the deduced wave function is related to the probability of finding the electron in space. The concept of atom is expanded to the molecular and the energy band theory of solid state physics. The energy band theory of solid state physics is applied to account the optical, electrical and thermal properties of solid states, also the fundamental princ

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。本課程包括幾何光學及物理光學。在幾何光學方面，將探討稜鏡反射鏡以及透鏡之成像原理。簡易之光學系統亦將討論。在物理光學方面，將探討光之傳播、偏振、干涉、繞射等原理。此外，傅氏光學干涉儀以及全像術亦將探討。
description.en: Optics is one of fundamental electro-optics program courses. It consists two parts: Geometrical Optics and Physical Optics. In Geometrical Optics, theories of imaging in prisms, mirrors, and lenses are discussed. Fundamental optical system are also studied. In Physical Optics, light propagation, polarization, interference and diffraction theories are studied. Besides, Fourier optics, interferometry and holography are also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生有關於鋼筋混凝土設計的基本原理，包含房屋之梁、版、柱、樓梯、基礎之設計及講授如何利用電腦的輔助設計，把繁瑣的設計規範、設計的計算，做更快速、更準確的分析，以期達到快速、準確、合理、經濟之設計目標。
description.en: The analysis and design (detailed design)of members in Building.Practical building code is applied to design reinforced concrete buildings mainly and steel structure buildings generally.Computer software is also used.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

description.zh: 實際演練室內設計工程中由生活需求分析及調查,規劃設立,施工,協調,管理等各種活動.並綜合性掌握環境中各種條件以習得室內設計的手法.
description.en: The Course is devided into five units : 1). The Nineteenth Century : The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). Foundation of Modernism (1890-1920) : In this period, the art community, including Cubism, Expressionism, De Stijl, Futurism and Constructivism, greatly influenced the form of building. 3).Modernism(1920-1970) : In this period, emphasises were placed on the "Less is More" , historicism and ornament were abandoned, the replacement were form and function, reason and abstraction. 4).Postmodernism (1965-1989) : Postmodernism architecture is characterized by the idea of "Less is Boring",and was inspired by Classical tradition and historical precedents. 5).Contemporary Pluralism : In the latter part of the twentieth century, an architect doesn't want to be associated with a movement, unle

description.zh: 1.無線通道介紹 2.天線與電波傳播簡介 3.電波傳播模式 4.巨/微/毫 細胞之電波傳播特性 5.窄頻通道之衰落效應6.寬頻通道之衰落效應 7.遮蔽效應 8.路徑分集 9.適應性天線
description.en: 1.The Wireless Communication Channel2.Fundamentals of Antenna and Propagation3.Propagation Models4.Marcro/Micro-Pico-cells5.Narrowband Fading6.Wideband Fading7.Shadowing8.Diversity9.Adaptive Antennas

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意自動控制數學基礎，物理系統的數學模式，控制器的種類，時域分析，穩定性分析，根軌跡法，頻率領域的分析，控制系統的設計，Z 轉換，數位控制，電腦控制之介面及程式，現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用，暫態響應，PID控制的影響，Lead-Lag控制的影響，頻率響應，系統判別，控制器設計。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method,  Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programmingof Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, Controller Design.

description.zh: 高性能混凝土之特性，材料，配比設計及試驗，品質管制，施工規範及構件行為。
description.en: This course focuses on the characteristics of high performance concrete, composition materials, mixture design and testing, quality management, construction specifications, as well as structural behavior.

name.zh: 有限元素法在大地工程之應用
name.en: Finite Element Method in Geotechnical Engineering

description.zh: 有限元素法常被用來模擬基礎施工、開控支撐及山坡地開控的過程，預估土壤或岩盤的變形行為，研判或分析施工的安全性。本課程的內容除了講授有限元素法的基本理論，尚須以大地工程的案例作為實際推導公式理論之演練。其案例包括滲流問題、壓密沉陷問題及土石結構穩定分析等等。
description.en: Finite element method ha been widely used to simulae the process of foundation construction, cut and bracing and excavation etc, and to predict and analyze the construction safety. This course should include the basic theory and sfiffues matrix formulation, in addition, geotechnical engineering problem are in addition, geotechical engineering problems are used to help students to understand the basic theory and code formulation. These examle problems includes seepage, consolidation and earth structure stability analyses.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練英語文溝通所必備之口語知能，如語音、重音、語調、語型等，以增進理解，達到溝通的目的。
description.en: For the purpose of promoting English communication ability, the course is aimed at cultivating the oral skill components, such as pronunciation, stress, intonation, sentence patterns, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程著重在使學生熟悉日常生活的英語會話並能夠以正常速度聽講。課程內容取材自學生周遭熟悉的事務更藉由每日傳播媒體素材來達到學生每天聽的習慣，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到講的目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking ability. The content includes authentic listening materials from lively radio programs and TV programs. It provides a variety of listening activities which give an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落，短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫，敘述，說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing.  To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships.  In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 科技管理有別於一般管理，主要以科技產業﹑科技領域﹑科技組織﹑科技人才為層面，探討各項管理技巧，管理科學的應用，其主要內容包含：１．科技管理的領域２．科技管理模式３．科技企業組織及管理４．科技專案管理５．科技行銷管理６．科技管理的新發展
description.en: 1. The coverage of technology management. 2. Technology management model. 3. The organization and management of technology corporation. 4. The management of technology projects. 5. The management of technology marketing. 6. The development of technology management.

description.zh: 科技管理有別於一般管理，主要以科技產業、科技領域、科技組織、科技人才為層面，探討各項管理技巧，管理科學的應用，其主要內容包含：1.科技管理的領域，2.科技管理模式，3.科技企業組織及管理，4.科技專案管理，5.科技行銷管理，6.科技管理的新發展。
description.en: 1.The coverage of technology management. 2.Technology management model. 3.The organization and management of technology      corporation.4.The management of technology projects. 5.The management of technology marketing. 6.The development of technology management.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散、平版照相術及薄膜沉積，然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Semiconductor Materials.

description.zh: 1. 晶體缺陷2. 缺陷偵測3. 晶體成長與溶解4. 溶解動力學5. 蝕刻在工程及研究之應用
description.en: 1. Defects of crystal 2. Detection of defect3. Growth and dissolution of crystal4. The kinetics and mechanism of dissolution5. Etching techniques in applied research and development

description.zh: 本課程由基本構造分析概念、運動力學分析、板塊構造等之介紹，進一步闡述斷層、節理、褶曲、劈理等構造現象。
description.en: The basic concept of structural dynamic analysis, introduction of plate tectonic and origin & characteristics of strata, fault, joints, fold and cleavage.

description.zh: 熱分析課程是闡述熱學基礎原理(熱力學,不可逆熱力學及動力學)以及其操作技巧;這包括:熱學.差示熱分析,熱量學,熱力學分析,熱膨脹以及熱失重分析。本課程適合大四及研一生。
description.en: The course of thermal analysis is described starting with its theories (thermodynamics, irreversible thermodynamics, and kinetics) and covering the basic techniques: thermometry, differential thermal analysis, calorimetry,thermo mechanical analysis and dilatometry, and thermogravimetry.This course is suitable for the senior undergraduate and beginning graduate students.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 低溫冷凍原理，低溫冷凍機簡介包括J-T及史特林冷凍機，低溫冷凍系統設計基礎包括製冷部份，保溫、熱交換容量控制等，各種低溫冷凍系統設計。
description.en: Principles of cryogenic cooling, introduction to low temperature and cryogenic coolers include J-T and stirring coolers, fundamentals of cryogenic design that includethe refrigeration, insulation heat exchange and capacity control , etc. Different system designs of cryogenic and low temperature systems.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛製造課程包含車輛製造現場管理和車輛製造技術流程兩大部分，使學生了解整個汽車製造產業上的設備管理、量產管理和品質管理，以及汽車製造上所需的各種工藝技術，以觸發學生對汽車製造領域的興趣，進而擴大未來在汽車產業的服務機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the spot management and technical operation of vehicle manufacture. Students will understand the fields in facilities management, output management and quality control from this course. Furthermore, the aim of this course is to increase the students' interest and opportunity in the region of vehicle manufacture.

description.zh: 1.電腦網路概述2.階層結構3.路由與交換4.流量與擁塞控制5.媒體存取控制6.區域網路協定與標準７．網路互連８．效能評估
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Network2.Layered Structure3.Routing and Switching 4.Flow and Congestion Control5.Medium Access Control 6.Local Area Network Protocols and Standards7.Network Interconnection8.Performance Analysis

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   光學元件、光學系統、精密機械元件、精密機械系統、光機系統之實務設計與個案研究
description.en: Optical elements, optical systems, elements of precision machinery, precision mechanical systems, optical machinery design and case study.

description.zh: 全適性設計專題在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足各種各樣的使用者需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認詮釋性設計思維方法與實務。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 數學基礎	- 機率	- 隨機程序：自相關函數與功率密度函數，高斯程序、白雜訊	- 正交開展與線性濾波	- 取樣與量化3. 最佳接收器設計	- 信號的幾何表示	- 最大事後機率與最大可能接收原理	- 相配濾波器	- 錯誤機率4. 數位調變與多工技術	- 數位調變：振幅移鍵調變、相位移鍵調變、四相振幅調變、頻率移鍵調變	- 數位調變的取捨條件：錯誤機率、功率、頻寬與複雜度	- 多工技術：分頻多工、分時多工、分碼多工5. 消息理論簡介	- 源編碼與熵	- 通道編碼與通訊容量
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Mathematical Preliminaries- Probability- Random processes: autocorrelation function and power spectral density, Gaussian processes, white noise- Orthonormal expansions and linear filtering	- Sampling and quantization3. Optimal Receiver Design	- Geometric interpretation of signals	- MAP and ML receiver principles	- Matched filters	- Probability of error 4. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing- Digital modulation: ASK, PSK, QAM, FSK- Digital modulation tradeoffs: error probability, power, bandwidth and complexity- Multiplexing: FDMA, TDMA and CDMA5. Introduction to Information Theory	- Source coding and entropy	- Channel coding and capacity

name.zh: 電腦媒介溝通與設計研究

description.zh: 從社會文化面、心理面、設計面，探討電腦媒介溝通與設計的關係與問題，並研究以電腦為媒介的溝通與設計，對群體、人與人間的行為模式、決策支援、媒體適當性等的影響，以期建立專案設計研究的溝通與設計原則。
description.en: From the social and cultural, philosophical and design perspectives, this course is to study the concerns and issues of computer-mediated communication and design, and to further explore the effects of computer-mediated communication and design related to group interaction, interpersonal behaviour, decision support, media appropriateness etc. This study also intends to establish the design principles of mediated communication and design for case study research

description.zh: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。

本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。1 .半導體物理特性基本概念，2.半導體製程初論，3 .薄膜製程原理，4 .擴散原理，5 .黃光製 程原理，6 .蝕刻製程原理，7 .晶片封裝，8 積體電路製程整合。本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。1 .半導體物理特性基本概念，2.半導體製程初論，3 .薄膜製程原理，4 .擴散原理，5 .黃光製 程原理，6 .蝕刻製程原理，7 .晶片封裝，8 積體電路製程整合。
